00240 // -------- AIC_SMR : (AIC Offset: 0x0) Control Register -------- 
00241 #define AT91C_AIC_PRIOR       ((unsigned int) 0x7 <<  0) // (AIC) Priority Level
00242 #define         AT91C_AIC_PRIOR_LOWEST               ((unsigned int) 0x0) // (AIC) Lowest priority level
00243 #define         AT91C_AIC_PRIOR_HIGHEST              ((unsigned int) 0x7) // (AIC) Highest priority level
00244 #define AT91C_AIC_SRCTYPE     ((unsigned int) 0x3 <<  5) // (AIC) Interrupt Source Type
00245 #define         AT91C_AIC_SRCTYPE_INT_HIGH_LEVEL       ((unsigned int) 0x0 <<  5) // (AIC) Internal Sources Code Label High-level Sensitive
00246 #define         AT91C_AIC_SRCTYPE_EXT_LOW_LEVEL        ((unsigned int) 0x0 <<  5) // (AIC) External Sources Code Label Low-level Sensitive
00247 #define         AT91C_AIC_SRCTYPE_INT_POSITIVE_EDGE    ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  5) // (AIC) Internal Sources Code Label Positive Edge triggered
00248 #define         AT91C_AIC_SRCTYPE_EXT_NEGATIVE_EDGE    ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  5) // (AIC) External Sources Code Label Negative Edge triggered
00249 #define         AT91C_AIC_SRCTYPE_HIGH_LEVEL           ((unsigned int) 0x2 <<  5) // (AIC) Internal Or External Sources Code Label High-level Sensitive
00250 #define         AT91C_AIC_SRCTYPE_POSITIVE_EDGE        ((unsigned int) 0x3 <<  5) // (AIC) Internal Or External Sources Code Label Positive Edge triggered
00251 // -------- AIC_CISR : (AIC Offset: 0x114) AIC Core Interrupt Status Register -------- 
00252 #define AT91C_AIC_NFIQ        ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  0) // (AIC) NFIQ Status
00253 #define AT91C_AIC_NIRQ        ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  1) // (AIC) NIRQ Status
00254 // -------- AIC_DCR : (AIC Offset: 0x138) AIC Debug Control Register (Protect) -------- 
00255 #define AT91C_AIC_DCR_PROT    ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  0) // (AIC) Protection Mode
00256 #define AT91C_AIC_DCR_GMSK    ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  1) // (AIC) General Mask
00257

00272 } AT91S_PDC, *AT91PS_PDC;

00274 // -------- PDC_PTCR : (PDC Offset: 0x20) PDC Transfer Control Register -------- 
00275 #define AT91C_PDC_RXTEN       ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  0) // (PDC) Receiver Transfer Enable
00276 #define AT91C_PDC_RXTDIS      ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  1) // (PDC) Receiver Transfer Disable
00277 #define AT91C_PDC_TXTEN       ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  8) // (PDC) Transmitter Transfer Enable
00278 #define AT91C_PDC_TXTDIS      ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  9) // (PDC) Transmitter Transfer Disable
00279 // -------- PDC_PTSR : (PDC Offset: 0x24) PDC Transfer Status Register --------

00311 // -------- DBGU_CR : (DBGU Offset: 0x0) Debug Unit Control Register -------- 
00312 #define AT91C_US_RSTRX        ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  2) // (DBGU) Reset Receiver
00313 #define AT91C_US_RSTTX        ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  3) // (DBGU) Reset Transmitter
00314 #define AT91C_US_RXEN         ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  4) // (DBGU) Receiver Enable
00315 #define AT91C_US_RXDIS        ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  5) // (DBGU) Receiver Disable
00316 #define AT91C_US_TXEN         ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  6) // (DBGU) Transmitter Enable
00317 #define AT91C_US_TXDIS        ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  7) // (DBGU) Transmitter Disable
00318 #define AT91C_US_RSTSTA       ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  8) // (DBGU) Reset Status Bits
00319 // -------- DBGU_MR : (DBGU Offset: 0x4) Debug Unit Mode Register -------- 
00320 #define AT91C_US_PAR          ((unsigned int) 0x7 <<  9) // (DBGU) Parity type
00321 #define         AT91C_US_PAR_EVEN                 ((unsigned int) 0x0 <<  9) // (DBGU) Even Parity
00322 #define         AT91C_US_PAR_ODD                  ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  9) // (DBGU) Odd Parity
00323 #define         AT91C_US_PAR_SPACE                ((unsigned int) 0x2 <<  9) // (DBGU) Parity forced to 0 (Space)
00324 #define         AT91C_US_PAR_MARK                 ((unsigned int) 0x3 <<  9) // (DBGU) Parity forced to 1 (Mark)
00325 #define         AT91C_US_PAR_NONE                 ((unsigned int) 0x4 <<  9) // (DBGU) No Parity
00326 #define         AT91C_US_PAR_MULTI_DROP           ((unsigned int) 0x6 <<  9) // (DBGU) Multi-drop mode
00327 #define AT91C_US_CHMODE       ((unsigned int) 0x3 << 14) // (DBGU) Channel Mode
00328 #define         AT91C_US_CHMODE_NORMAL               ((unsigned int) 0x0 << 14) // (DBGU) Normal Mode: The USART channel operates as an RX/TX USART.
00329 #define         AT91C_US_CHMODE_AUTO                 ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 14) // (DBGU) Automatic Echo: Receiver Data Input is connected to the TXD pin.
00330 #define         AT91C_US_CHMODE_LOCAL                ((unsigned int) 0x2 << 14) // (DBGU) Local Loopback: Transmitter Output Signal is connected to Receiver Input Signal.
00331 #define         AT91C_US_CHMODE_REMOTE               ((unsigned int) 0x3 << 14) // (DBGU) Remote Loopback: RXD pin is internally connected to TXD pin.
00332 // -------- DBGU_IER : (DBGU Offset: 0x8) Debug Unit Interrupt Enable Register -------- 
00333 #define AT91C_US_RXRDY        ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  0) // (DBGU) RXRDY Interrupt
00334 #define AT91C_US_TXRDY        ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  1) // (DBGU) TXRDY Interrupt
00335 #define AT91C_US_ENDRX        ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  3) // (DBGU) End of Receive Transfer Interrupt
00336 #define AT91C_US_ENDTX        ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  4) // (DBGU) End of Transmit Interrupt
00337 #define AT91C_US_OVRE         ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  5) // (DBGU) Overrun Interrupt
00338 #define AT91C_US_FRAME        ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  6) // (DBGU) Framing Error Interrupt
00339 #define AT91C_US_PARE         ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  7) // (DBGU) Parity Error Interrupt
00340 #define AT91C_US_TXEMPTY      ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  9) // (DBGU) TXEMPTY Interrupt
00341 #define AT91C_US_TXBUFE       ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 11) // (DBGU) TXBUFE Interrupt
00342 #define AT91C_US_RXBUFF       ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 12) // (DBGU) RXBUFF Interrupt
00343 #define AT91C_US_COMM_TX      ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 30) // (DBGU) COMM_TX Interrupt
00344 #define AT91C_US_COMM_RX      ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 31) // (DBGU) COMM_RX Interrupt
00345 // -------- DBGU_IDR : (DBGU Offset: 0xc) Debug Unit Interrupt Disable Register -------- 
00346 // -------- DBGU_IMR : (DBGU Offset: 0x10) Debug Unit Interrupt Mask Register -------- 
00347 // -------- DBGU_CSR : (DBGU Offset: 0x14) Debug Unit Channel Status Register -------- 
00348 // -------- DBGU_FNTR : (DBGU Offset: 0x48) Debug Unit FORCE_NTRST Register -------- 
00349 #define AT91C_US_FORCE_NTRST  ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  0) // (DBGU) Force NTRST in JTAG
00350 
00351 // *****************************************************************************
00352 //              SOFTWARE API DEFINITION  FOR Parallel Input Output Controler
00353 // *****************************************************************************
00354 typedef struct _AT91S_PIO {
00355         AT91_REG         PIO_PER;       // PIO Enable Register
00356         AT91_REG         PIO_PDR;       // PIO Disable Register
00357         AT91_REG         PIO_PSR;       // PIO Status Register
00358         AT91_REG         Reserved0[1];  // 
00359         AT91_REG         PIO_OER;       // Output Enable Register
00360         AT91_REG         PIO_ODR;       // Output Disable Registerr
00361         AT91_REG         PIO_OSR;       // Output Status Register
00362         AT91_REG         Reserved1[1];  // 
00363         AT91_REG         PIO_IFER;      // Input Filter Enable Register
00364         AT91_REG         PIO_IFDR;      // Input Filter Disable Register
00365         AT91_REG         PIO_IFSR;      // Input Filter Status Register
00366         AT91_REG         Reserved2[1];  // 
00367         AT91_REG         PIO_SODR;      // Set Output Data Register
00368         AT91_REG         PIO_CODR;      // Clear Output Data Register
00369         AT91_REG         PIO_ODSR;      // Output Data Status Register
00370         AT91_REG         PIO_PDSR;      // Pin Data Status Register
00371         AT91_REG         PIO_IER;       // Interrupt Enable Register
00372         AT91_REG         PIO_IDR;       // Interrupt Disable Register
00373         AT91_REG         PIO_IMR;       // Interrupt Mask Register
00374         AT91_REG         PIO_ISR;       // Interrupt Status Register
00375         AT91_REG         PIO_MDER;      // Multi-driver Enable Register
00376         AT91_REG         PIO_MDDR;      // Multi-driver Disable Register
00377         AT91_REG         PIO_MDSR;      // Multi-driver Status Register
00378         AT91_REG         Reserved3[1];  // 
00379         AT91_REG         PIO_PPUDR;     // Pull-up Disable Register
00380         AT91_REG         PIO_PPUER;     // Pull-up Enable Register
00381         AT91_REG         PIO_PPUSR;     // Pull-up Status Register
00382         AT91_REG         Reserved4[1];  // 
00383         AT91_REG         PIO_ASR;       // Select A Register
00384         AT91_REG         PIO_BSR;       // Select B Register
00385         AT91_REG         PIO_ABSR;      // AB Select Status Register
00386         AT91_REG         Reserved5[9];  // 
00387         AT91_REG         PIO_OWER;      // Output Write Enable Register
00388         AT91_REG         PIO_OWDR;      // Output Write Disable Register
00389         AT91_REG         PIO_OWSR;      // Output Write Status Register
00390 } AT91S_PIO, *AT91PS_PIO;

00393 // *****************************************************************************
00394 //              SOFTWARE API DEFINITION  FOR Clock Generator Controler
00395 // *****************************************************************************
00396 typedef struct _AT91S_CKGR {
00397         AT91_REG         CKGR_MOR;      // Main Oscillator Register
00398         AT91_REG         CKGR_MCFR;     // Main Clock  Frequency Register
00399         AT91_REG         Reserved0[1];  // 
00400         AT91_REG         CKGR_PLLR;     // PLL Register
00401 } AT91S_CKGR, *AT91PS_CKGR;
00402 
00403 // -------- CKGR_MOR : (CKGR Offset: 0x0) Main Oscillator Register -------- 
00404 #define AT91C_CKGR_MOSCEN     ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  0) // (CKGR) Main Oscillator Enable
00405 #define AT91C_CKGR_OSCBYPASS  ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  1) // (CKGR) Main Oscillator Bypass
00406 #define AT91C_CKGR_OSCOUNT    ((unsigned int) 0xFF <<  8) // (CKGR) Main Oscillator Start-up Time
00407 // -------- CKGR_MCFR : (CKGR Offset: 0x4) Main Clock Frequency Register -------- 
00408 #define AT91C_CKGR_MAINF      ((unsigned int) 0xFFFF <<  0) // (CKGR) Main Clock Frequency
00409 #define AT91C_CKGR_MAINRDY    ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 16) // (CKGR) Main Clock Ready
00410 // -------- CKGR_PLLR : (CKGR Offset: 0xc) PLL B Register -------- 
00411 #define AT91C_CKGR_DIV        ((unsigned int) 0xFF <<  0) // (CKGR) Divider Selected
00412 #define         AT91C_CKGR_DIV_0                    ((unsigned int) 0x0) // (CKGR) Divider output is 0
00413 #define         AT91C_CKGR_DIV_BYPASS               ((unsigned int) 0x1) // (CKGR) Divider is bypassed
00414 #define AT91C_CKGR_PLLCOUNT   ((unsigned int) 0x3F <<  8) // (CKGR) PLL Counter
00415 #define AT91C_CKGR_OUT        ((unsigned int) 0x3 << 14) // (CKGR) PLL Output Frequency Range
00416 #define         AT91C_CKGR_OUT_0                    ((unsigned int) 0x0 << 14) // (CKGR) Please refer to the PLL datasheet
00417 #define         AT91C_CKGR_OUT_1                    ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 14) // (CKGR) Please refer to the PLL datasheet
00418 #define         AT91C_CKGR_OUT_2                    ((unsigned int) 0x2 << 14) // (CKGR) Please refer to the PLL datasheet
00419 #define         AT91C_CKGR_OUT_3                    ((unsigned int) 0x3 << 14) // (CKGR) Please refer to the PLL datasheet
00420 #define AT91C_CKGR_MUL        ((unsigned int) 0x7FF << 16) // (CKGR) PLL Multiplier
00421 #define AT91C_CKGR_USBDIV     ((unsigned int) 0x3 << 28) // (CKGR) Divider for USB Clocks
00422 #define         AT91C_CKGR_USBDIV_0                    ((unsigned int) 0x0 << 28) // (CKGR) Divider output is PLL clock output
00423 #define         AT91C_CKGR_USBDIV_1                    ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 28) // (CKGR) Divider output is PLL clock output divided by 2
00424 #define         AT91C_CKGR_USBDIV_2                    ((unsigned int) 0x2 << 28) // (CKGR) Divider output is PLL clock output divided by 4

00426 // *****************************************************************************
00427 //              SOFTWARE API DEFINITION  FOR Power Management Controler
00428 // *****************************************************************************
00429 typedef struct _AT91S_PMC {
00430         AT91_REG         PMC_SCER;      // System Clock Enable Register
00431         AT91_REG         PMC_SCDR;      // System Clock Disable Register
00432         AT91_REG         PMC_SCSR;      // System Clock Status Register
00433         AT91_REG         Reserved0[1];  // 
00434         AT91_REG         PMC_PCER;      // Peripheral Clock Enable Register
00435         AT91_REG         PMC_PCDR;      // Peripheral Clock Disable Register
00436         AT91_REG         PMC_PCSR;      // Peripheral Clock Status Register
00437         AT91_REG         Reserved1[1];  // 
00438         AT91_REG         PMC_MOR;       // Main Oscillator Register
00439         AT91_REG         PMC_MCFR;      // Main Clock  Frequency Register
00440         AT91_REG         Reserved2[1];  // 
00441         AT91_REG         PMC_PLLR;      // PLL Register
00442         AT91_REG         PMC_MCKR;      // Master Clock Register
00443         AT91_REG         Reserved3[3];  // 
00444         AT91_REG         PMC_PCKR[4];   // Programmable Clock Register
00445         AT91_REG         Reserved4[4];  // 
00446         AT91_REG         PMC_IER;       // Interrupt Enable Register
00447         AT91_REG         PMC_IDR;       // Interrupt Disable Register
00448         AT91_REG         PMC_SR;        // Status Register
00449         AT91_REG         PMC_IMR;       // Interrupt Mask Register
00450 } AT91S_PMC, *AT91PS_PMC;
00451 
00452 // -------- PMC_SCER : (PMC Offset: 0x0) System Clock Enable Register -------- 
00453 #define AT91C_PMC_PCK         ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  0) // (PMC) Processor Clock
00454 #define AT91C_PMC_UDP         ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  7) // (PMC) USB Device Port Clock
00455 #define AT91C_PMC_PCK0        ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  8) // (PMC) Programmable Clock Output
00456 #define AT91C_PMC_PCK1        ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  9) // (PMC) Programmable Clock Output
00457 #define AT91C_PMC_PCK2        ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 10) // (PMC) Programmable Clock Output
00458 #define AT91C_PMC_PCK3        ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 11) // (PMC) Programmable Clock Output
00459 // -------- PMC_SCDR : (PMC Offset: 0x4) System Clock Disable Register -------- 
00460 // -------- PMC_SCSR : (PMC Offset: 0x8) System Clock Status Register -------- 
00461 // -------- CKGR_MOR : (PMC Offset: 0x20) Main Oscillator Register -------- 
00462 // -------- CKGR_MCFR : (PMC Offset: 0x24) Main Clock Frequency Register -------- 
00463 // -------- CKGR_PLLR : (PMC Offset: 0x2c) PLL B Register -------- 
00464 // -------- PMC_MCKR : (PMC Offset: 0x30) Master Clock Register -------- 
00465 #define AT91C_PMC_CSS         ((unsigned int) 0x3 <<  0) // (PMC) Programmable Clock Selection
00466 #define         AT91C_PMC_CSS_SLOW_CLK             ((unsigned int) 0x0) // (PMC) Slow Clock is selected
00467 #define         AT91C_PMC_CSS_MAIN_CLK             ((unsigned int) 0x1) // (PMC) Main Clock is selected
00468 #define         AT91C_PMC_CSS_PLL_CLK              ((unsigned int) 0x3) // (PMC) Clock from PLL is selected
00469 #define AT91C_PMC_PRES        ((unsigned int) 0x7 <<  2) // (PMC) Programmable Clock Prescaler
00470 #define         AT91C_PMC_PRES_CLK                  ((unsigned int) 0x0 <<  2) // (PMC) Selected clock
00471 #define         AT91C_PMC_PRES_CLK_2                ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  2) // (PMC) Selected clock divided by 2
00472 #define         AT91C_PMC_PRES_CLK_4                ((unsigned int) 0x2 <<  2) // (PMC) Selected clock divided by 4
00473 #define         AT91C_PMC_PRES_CLK_8                ((unsigned int) 0x3 <<  2) // (PMC) Selected clock divided by 8
00474 #define         AT91C_PMC_PRES_CLK_16               ((unsigned int) 0x4 <<  2) // (PMC) Selected clock divided by 16
00475 #define         AT91C_PMC_PRES_CLK_32               ((unsigned int) 0x5 <<  2) // (PMC) Selected clock divided by 32
00476 #define         AT91C_PMC_PRES_CLK_64               ((unsigned int) 0x6 <<  2) // (PMC) Selected clock divided by 64
00477 // -------- PMC_PCKR : (PMC Offset: 0x40) Programmable Clock Register -------- 
00478 // -------- PMC_IER : (PMC Offset: 0x60) PMC Interrupt Enable Register -------- 
00479 #define AT91C_PMC_MOSCS       ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  0) // (PMC) MOSC Status/Enable/Disable/Mask
00480 #define AT91C_PMC_LOCK        ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  2) // (PMC) PLL Status/Enable/Disable/Mask
00481 #define AT91C_PMC_MCKRDY      ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  3) // (PMC) MCK_RDY Status/Enable/Disable/Mask
00482 #define AT91C_PMC_PCK0RDY     ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  8) // (PMC) PCK0_RDY Status/Enable/Disable/Mask
00483 #define AT91C_PMC_PCK1RDY     ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  9) // (PMC) PCK1_RDY Status/Enable/Disable/Mask
00484 #define AT91C_PMC_PCK2RDY     ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 10) // (PMC) PCK2_RDY Status/Enable/Disable/Mask
00485 #define AT91C_PMC_PCK3RDY     ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 11) // (PMC) PCK3_RDY Status/Enable/Disable/Mask
00486 // -------- PMC_IDR : (PMC Offset: 0x64) PMC Interrupt Disable Register -------- 
00487 // -------- PMC_SR : (PMC Offset: 0x68) PMC Status Register -------- 
00488 // -------- PMC_IMR : (PMC Offset: 0x6c) PMC Interrupt Mask Register -------- 
00489 
00490 // *****************************************************************************
00491 //              SOFTWARE API DEFINITION  FOR Reset Controller Interface
00492 // *****************************************************************************
00493 typedef struct _AT91S_RSTC {
00494         AT91_REG         RSTC_RCR;      // Reset Control Register
00495         AT91_REG         RSTC_RSR;      // Reset Status Register
00496         AT91_REG         RSTC_RMR;      // Reset Mode Register
00497 } AT91S_RSTC, *AT91PS_RSTC;
00498 
00499 // -------- RSTC_RCR : (RSTC Offset: 0x0) Reset Control Register -------- 
00500 #define AT91C_RSTC_PROCRST    ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  0) // (RSTC) Processor Reset
00501 #define AT91C_RSTC_PERRST     ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  2) // (RSTC) Peripheral Reset
00502 #define AT91C_RSTC_EXTRST     ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  3) // (RSTC) External Reset
00503 #define AT91C_RSTC_KEY        ((unsigned int) 0xFF << 24) // (RSTC) Password
00504 // -------- RSTC_RSR : (RSTC Offset: 0x4) Reset Status Register -------- 
00505 #define AT91C_RSTC_URSTS      ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  0) // (RSTC) User Reset Status
00506 #define AT91C_RSTC_BODSTS     ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  1) // (RSTC) Brownout Detection Status
00507 #define AT91C_RSTC_RSTTYP     ((unsigned int) 0x7 <<  8) // (RSTC) Reset Type
00508 #define         AT91C_RSTC_RSTTYP_POWERUP              ((unsigned int) 0x0 <<  8) // (RSTC) Power-up Reset. VDDCORE rising.
00509 #define         AT91C_RSTC_RSTTYP_WAKEUP               ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  8) // (RSTC) WakeUp Reset. VDDCORE rising.
00510 #define         AT91C_RSTC_RSTTYP_WATCHDOG             ((unsigned int) 0x2 <<  8) // (RSTC) Watchdog Reset. Watchdog overflow occured.
00511 #define         AT91C_RSTC_RSTTYP_SOFTWARE             ((unsigned int) 0x3 <<  8) // (RSTC) Software Reset. Processor reset required by the software.
00512 #define         AT91C_RSTC_RSTTYP_USER                 ((unsigned int) 0x4 <<  8) // (RSTC) User Reset. NRST pin detected low.
00513 #define         AT91C_RSTC_RSTTYP_BROWNOUT             ((unsigned int) 0x5 <<  8) // (RSTC) Brownout Reset occured.
00514 #define AT91C_RSTC_NRSTL      ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 16) // (RSTC) NRST pin level
00515 #define AT91C_RSTC_SRCMP      ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 17) // (RSTC) Software Reset Command in Progress.
00516 // -------- RSTC_RMR : (RSTC Offset: 0x8) Reset Mode Register -------- 
00517 #define AT91C_RSTC_URSTEN     ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  0) // (RSTC) User Reset Enable
00518 #define AT91C_RSTC_URSTIEN    ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  4) // (RSTC) User Reset Interrupt Enable
00519 #define AT91C_RSTC_ERSTL      ((unsigned int) 0xF <<  8) // (RSTC) User Reset Enable
00520 #define AT91C_RSTC_BODIEN     ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 16) // (RSTC) Brownout Detection Interrupt Enable
00521

00575 // -------- WDTC_WDCR : (WDTC Offset: 0x0) Periodic Interval Image Register --------

00577 #define AT91C_WDTC_KEY        ((unsigned int) 0xFF << 24) // (WDTC) Watchdog KEY Password

00583 #define AT91C_WDTC_WDDIS      ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 15) // (WDTC) Watchdog Disable
00584 #define AT91C_WDTC_WDD        ((unsigned int) 0xFFF << 16) // (WDTC) Watchdog Delta Value
00585 #define AT91C_WDTC_WDDBGHLT   ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 28) // (WDTC) Watchdog Debug Halt
00586 #define AT91C_WDTC_WDIDLEHLT  ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 29) // (WDTC) Watchdog Idle Halt
00587 // -------- WDTC_WDSR : (WDTC Offset: 0x8) Watchdog Status Register -------- 
00588 #define AT91C_WDTC_WDUNF      ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  0) // (WDTC) Watchdog Underflow
00589 #define AT91C_WDTC_WDERR      ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  1) // (WDTC) Watchdog Error

00598 // -------- VREG_MR : (VREG Offset: 0x0) Voltage Regulator Mode Register --------

00601 // *****************************************************************************
00602 //              SOFTWARE API DEFINITION  FOR Memory Controller Interface
00603 // *****************************************************************************
00604 typedef struct _AT91S_MC {
00605         AT91_REG         MC_RCR;        // MC Remap Control Register
00606         AT91_REG         MC_ASR;        // MC Abort Status Register
00607         AT91_REG         MC_AASR;       // MC Abort Address Status Register
00608         AT91_REG         Reserved0[21];         // 
00609         AT91_REG         MC_FMR;        // MC Flash Mode Register
00610         AT91_REG         MC_FCR;        // MC Flash Command Register
00611         AT91_REG         MC_FSR;        // MC Flash Status Register
00612 } AT91S_MC, *AT91PS_MC;
00613 
00614 // -------- MC_RCR : (MC Offset: 0x0) MC Remap Control Register -------- 
00615 #define AT91C_MC_RCB          ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  0) // (MC) Remap Command Bit
00616 // -------- MC_ASR : (MC Offset: 0x4) MC Abort Status Register -------- 
00617 #define AT91C_MC_UNDADD       ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  0) // (MC) Undefined Addess Abort Status
00618 #define AT91C_MC_MISADD       ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  1) // (MC) Misaligned Addess Abort Status
00619 #define AT91C_MC_ABTSZ        ((unsigned int) 0x3 <<  8) // (MC) Abort Size Status
00620 #define         AT91C_MC_ABTSZ_BYTE                 ((unsigned int) 0x0 <<  8) // (MC) Byte
00621 #define         AT91C_MC_ABTSZ_HWORD                ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  8) // (MC) Half-word
00622 #define         AT91C_MC_ABTSZ_WORD                 ((unsigned int) 0x2 <<  8) // (MC) Word
00623 #define AT91C_MC_ABTTYP       ((unsigned int) 0x3 << 10) // (MC) Abort Type Status
00624 #define         AT91C_MC_ABTTYP_DATAR                ((unsigned int) 0x0 << 10) // (MC) Data Read
00625 #define         AT91C_MC_ABTTYP_DATAW                ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 10) // (MC) Data Write
00626 #define         AT91C_MC_ABTTYP_FETCH                ((unsigned int) 0x2 << 10) // (MC) Code Fetch
00627 #define AT91C_MC_MST0         ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 16) // (MC) Master 0 Abort Source
00628 #define AT91C_MC_MST1         ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 17) // (MC) Master 1 Abort Source
00629 #define AT91C_MC_SVMST0       ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 24) // (MC) Saved Master 0 Abort Source
00630 #define AT91C_MC_SVMST1       ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 25) // (MC) Saved Master 1 Abort Source
00631 // -------- MC_FMR : (MC Offset: 0x60) MC Flash Mode Register -------- 
00632 #define AT91C_MC_FRDY         ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  0) // (MC) Flash Ready
00633 #define AT91C_MC_LOCKE        ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  2) // (MC) Lock Error
00634 #define AT91C_MC_PROGE        ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  3) // (MC) Programming Error
00635 #define AT91C_MC_NEBP         ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  7) // (MC) No Erase Before Programming
00636 #define AT91C_MC_FWS          ((unsigned int) 0x3 <<  8) // (MC) Flash Wait State
00637 #define         AT91C_MC_FWS_0FWS                 ((unsigned int) 0x0 <<  8) // (MC) 1 cycle for Read, 2 for Write operations
00638 #define         AT91C_MC_FWS_1FWS                 ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  8) // (MC) 2 cycles for Read, 3 for Write operations
00639 #define         AT91C_MC_FWS_2FWS                 ((unsigned int) 0x2 <<  8) // (MC) 3 cycles for Read, 4 for Write operations
00640 #define         AT91C_MC_FWS_3FWS                 ((unsigned int) 0x3 <<  8) // (MC) 4 cycles for Read, 4 for Write operations
00641 #define AT91C_MC_FMCN         ((unsigned int) 0xFF << 16) // (MC) Flash Microsecond Cycle Number
00642 // -------- MC_FCR : (MC Offset: 0x64) MC Flash Command Register -------- 
00643 #define AT91C_MC_FCMD         ((unsigned int) 0xF <<  0) // (MC) Flash Command
00644 #define         AT91C_MC_FCMD_START_PROG           ((unsigned int) 0x1) // (MC) Starts the programming of th epage specified by PAGEN.
00645 #define         AT91C_MC_FCMD_LOCK                 ((unsigned int) 0x2) // (MC) Starts a lock sequence of the sector defined by the bits 4 to 7 of the field PAGEN.
00646 #define         AT91C_MC_FCMD_PROG_AND_LOCK        ((unsigned int) 0x3) // (MC) The lock sequence automatically happens after the programming sequence is completed.
00647 #define         AT91C_MC_FCMD_UNLOCK               ((unsigned int) 0x4) // (MC) Starts an unlock sequence of the sector defined by the bits 4 to 7 of the field PAGEN.
00648 #define         AT91C_MC_FCMD_ERASE_ALL            ((unsigned int) 0x8) // (MC) Starts the erase of the entire flash.If at least a page is locked, the command is cancelled.
00649 #define         AT91C_MC_FCMD_SET_GP_NVM           ((unsigned int) 0xB) // (MC) Set General Purpose NVM bits.
00650 #define         AT91C_MC_FCMD_CLR_GP_NVM           ((unsigned int) 0xD) // (MC) Clear General Purpose NVM bits.
00651 #define         AT91C_MC_FCMD_SET_SECURITY         ((unsigned int) 0xF) // (MC) Set Security Bit.
00652 #define AT91C_MC_PAGEN        ((unsigned int) 0x3FF <<  8) // (MC) Page Number
00653 #define AT91C_MC_KEY          ((unsigned int) 0xFF << 24) // (MC) Writing Protect Key
00654 // -------- MC_FSR : (MC Offset: 0x68) MC Flash Command Register -------- 
00655 #define AT91C_MC_SECURITY     ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  4) // (MC) Security Bit Status
00656 #define AT91C_MC_GPNVM0       ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  8) // (MC) Sector 0 Lock Status
00657 #define AT91C_MC_GPNVM1       ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  9) // (MC) Sector 1 Lock Status
00658 #define AT91C_MC_GPNVM2       ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 10) // (MC) Sector 2 Lock Status
00659 #define AT91C_MC_GPNVM3       ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 11) // (MC) Sector 3 Lock Status
00660 #define AT91C_MC_GPNVM4       ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 12) // (MC) Sector 4 Lock Status
00661 #define AT91C_MC_GPNVM5       ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 13) // (MC) Sector 5 Lock Status
00662 #define AT91C_MC_GPNVM6       ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 14) // (MC) Sector 6 Lock Status
00663 #define AT91C_MC_GPNVM7       ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 15) // (MC) Sector 7 Lock Status
00664 #define AT91C_MC_LOCKS0       ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 16) // (MC) Sector 0 Lock Status
00665 #define AT91C_MC_LOCKS1       ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 17) // (MC) Sector 1 Lock Status
00666 #define AT91C_MC_LOCKS2       ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 18) // (MC) Sector 2 Lock Status
00667 #define AT91C_MC_LOCKS3       ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 19) // (MC) Sector 3 Lock Status
00668 #define AT91C_MC_LOCKS4       ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 20) // (MC) Sector 4 Lock Status
00669 #define AT91C_MC_LOCKS5       ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 21) // (MC) Sector 5 Lock Status
00670 #define AT91C_MC_LOCKS6       ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 22) // (MC) Sector 6 Lock Status
00671 #define AT91C_MC_LOCKS7       ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 23) // (MC) Sector 7 Lock Status
00672 #define AT91C_MC_LOCKS8       ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 24) // (MC) Sector 8 Lock Status
00673 #define AT91C_MC_LOCKS9       ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 25) // (MC) Sector 9 Lock Status
00674 #define AT91C_MC_LOCKS10      ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 26) // (MC) Sector 10 Lock Status
00675 #define AT91C_MC_LOCKS11      ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 27) // (MC) Sector 11 Lock Status
00676 #define AT91C_MC_LOCKS12      ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 28) // (MC) Sector 12 Lock Status
00677 #define AT91C_MC_LOCKS13      ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 29) // (MC) Sector 13 Lock Status
00678 #define AT91C_MC_LOCKS14      ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 30) // (MC) Sector 14 Lock Status
00679 #define AT91C_MC_LOCKS15      ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 31) // (MC) Sector 15 Lock Status
00680 
00681 // *****************************************************************************
00682 //              SOFTWARE API DEFINITION  FOR Serial Parallel Interface
00683 // *****************************************************************************
00684 typedef struct _AT91S_SPI {
00685         AT91_REG         SPI_CR;        // Control Register
00686         AT91_REG         SPI_MR;        // Mode Register
00687         AT91_REG         SPI_RDR;       // Receive Data Register
00688         AT91_REG         SPI_TDR;       // Transmit Data Register
00689         AT91_REG         SPI_SR;        // Status Register
00690         AT91_REG         SPI_IER;       // Interrupt Enable Register
00691         AT91_REG         SPI_IDR;       // Interrupt Disable Register
00692         AT91_REG         SPI_IMR;       // Interrupt Mask Register
00693         AT91_REG         Reserved0[4];  // 
00694         AT91_REG         SPI_CSR[4];    // Chip Select Register
00695         AT91_REG         Reserved1[48];         // 
00696         AT91_REG         SPI_RPR;       // Receive Pointer Register
00697         AT91_REG         SPI_RCR;       // Receive Counter Register
00698         AT91_REG         SPI_TPR;       // Transmit Pointer Register
00699         AT91_REG         SPI_TCR;       // Transmit Counter Register
00700         AT91_REG         SPI_RNPR;      // Receive Next Pointer Register
00701         AT91_REG         SPI_RNCR;      // Receive Next Counter Register
00702         AT91_REG         SPI_TNPR;      // Transmit Next Pointer Register
00703         AT91_REG         SPI_TNCR;      // Transmit Next Counter Register
00704         AT91_REG         SPI_PTCR;      // PDC Transfer Control Register
00705         AT91_REG         SPI_PTSR;      // PDC Transfer Status Register
00706 } AT91S_SPI, *AT91PS_SPI;
00707 
00708 // -------- SPI_CR : (SPI Offset: 0x0) SPI Control Register -------- 
00709 #define AT91C_SPI_SPIEN       ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  0) // (SPI) SPI Enable
00710 #define AT91C_SPI_SPIDIS      ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  1) // (SPI) SPI Disable
00711 #define AT91C_SPI_SWRST       ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  7) // (SPI) SPI Software reset
00712 #define AT91C_SPI_LASTXFER    ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 24) // (SPI) SPI Last Transfer
00713 // -------- SPI_MR : (SPI Offset: 0x4) SPI Mode Register -------- 
00714 #define AT91C_SPI_MSTR        ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  0) // (SPI) Master/Slave Mode
00715 #define AT91C_SPI_PS          ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  1) // (SPI) Peripheral Select
00716 #define         AT91C_SPI_PS_FIXED                ((unsigned int) 0x0 <<  1) // (SPI) Fixed Peripheral Select
00717 #define         AT91C_SPI_PS_VARIABLE             ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  1) // (SPI) Variable Peripheral Select
00718 #define AT91C_SPI_PCSDEC      ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  2) // (SPI) Chip Select Decode
00719 #define AT91C_SPI_FDIV        ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  3) // (SPI) Clock Selection
00720 #define AT91C_SPI_MODFDIS     ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  4) // (SPI) Mode Fault Detection
00721 #define AT91C_SPI_LLB         ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  7) // (SPI) Clock Selection
00722 #define AT91C_SPI_PCS         ((unsigned int) 0xF << 16) // (SPI) Peripheral Chip Select
00723 #define AT91C_SPI_DLYBCS      ((unsigned int) 0xFF << 24) // (SPI) Delay Between Chip Selects
00724 // -------- SPI_RDR : (SPI Offset: 0x8) Receive Data Register -------- 
00725 #define AT91C_SPI_RD          ((unsigned int) 0xFFFF <<  0) // (SPI) Receive Data
00726 #define AT91C_SPI_RPCS        ((unsigned int) 0xF << 16) // (SPI) Peripheral Chip Select Status
00727 // -------- SPI_TDR : (SPI Offset: 0xc) Transmit Data Register -------- 
00728 #define AT91C_SPI_TD          ((unsigned int) 0xFFFF <<  0) // (SPI) Transmit Data
00729 #define AT91C_SPI_TPCS        ((unsigned int) 0xF << 16) // (SPI) Peripheral Chip Select Status
00730 // -------- SPI_SR : (SPI Offset: 0x10) Status Register -------- 
00731 #define AT91C_SPI_RDRF        ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  0) // (SPI) Receive Data Register Full
00732 #define AT91C_SPI_TDRE        ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  1) // (SPI) Transmit Data Register Empty
00733 #define AT91C_SPI_MODF        ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  2) // (SPI) Mode Fault Error
00734 #define AT91C_SPI_OVRES       ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  3) // (SPI) Overrun Error Status
00735 #define AT91C_SPI_ENDRX       ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  4) // (SPI) End of Receiver Transfer
00736 #define AT91C_SPI_ENDTX       ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  5) // (SPI) End of Receiver Transfer
00737 #define AT91C_SPI_RXBUFF      ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  6) // (SPI) RXBUFF Interrupt
00738 #define AT91C_SPI_TXBUFE      ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  7) // (SPI) TXBUFE Interrupt
00739 #define AT91C_SPI_NSSR        ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  8) // (SPI) NSSR Interrupt
00740 #define AT91C_SPI_TXEMPTY     ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  9) // (SPI) TXEMPTY Interrupt
00741 #define AT91C_SPI_SPIENS      ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 16) // (SPI) Enable Status
00742 // -------- SPI_IER : (SPI Offset: 0x14) Interrupt Enable Register -------- 
00743 // -------- SPI_IDR : (SPI Offset: 0x18) Interrupt Disable Register -------- 
00744 // -------- SPI_IMR : (SPI Offset: 0x1c) Interrupt Mask Register -------- 
00745 // -------- SPI_CSR : (SPI Offset: 0x30) Chip Select Register -------- 
00746 #define AT91C_SPI_CPOL        ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  0) // (SPI) Clock Polarity
00747 #define AT91C_SPI_NCPHA       ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  1) // (SPI) Clock Phase
00748 #define AT91C_SPI_CSAAT       ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  3) // (SPI) Chip Select Active After Transfer
00749 #define AT91C_SPI_BITS        ((unsigned int) 0xF <<  4) // (SPI) Bits Per Transfer
00750 #define         AT91C_SPI_BITS_8                    ((unsigned int) 0x0 <<  4) // (SPI) 8 Bits Per transfer
00751 #define         AT91C_SPI_BITS_9                    ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  4) // (SPI) 9 Bits Per transfer
00752 #define         AT91C_SPI_BITS_10                   ((unsigned int) 0x2 <<  4) // (SPI) 10 Bits Per transfer
00753 #define         AT91C_SPI_BITS_11                   ((unsigned int) 0x3 <<  4) // (SPI) 11 Bits Per transfer
00754 #define         AT91C_SPI_BITS_12                   ((unsigned int) 0x4 <<  4) // (SPI) 12 Bits Per transfer
00755 #define         AT91C_SPI_BITS_13                   ((unsigned int) 0x5 <<  4) // (SPI) 13 Bits Per transfer
00756 #define         AT91C_SPI_BITS_14                   ((unsigned int) 0x6 <<  4) // (SPI) 14 Bits Per transfer
00757 #define         AT91C_SPI_BITS_15                   ((unsigned int) 0x7 <<  4) // (SPI) 15 Bits Per transfer
00758 #define         AT91C_SPI_BITS_16                   ((unsigned int) 0x8 <<  4) // (SPI) 16 Bits Per transfer
00759 #define AT91C_SPI_SCBR        ((unsigned int) 0xFF <<  8) // (SPI) Serial Clock Baud Rate
00760 #define AT91C_SPI_DLYBS       ((unsigned int) 0xFF << 16) // (SPI) Delay Before SPCK
00761 #define AT91C_SPI_DLYBCT      ((unsigned int) 0xFF << 24) // (SPI) Delay Between Consecutive Transfers
