00763 // *****************************************************************************
00764 //              SOFTWARE API DEFINITION  FOR Usart
00765 // *****************************************************************************
00766 typedef struct _AT91S_USART {
00767         AT91_REG         US_CR;         // Control Register
00768         AT91_REG         US_MR;         // Mode Register
00769         AT91_REG         US_IER;        // Interrupt Enable Register
00770         AT91_REG         US_IDR;        // Interrupt Disable Register
00771         AT91_REG         US_IMR;        // Interrupt Mask Register
00772         AT91_REG         US_CSR;        // Channel Status Register
00773         AT91_REG         US_RHR;        // Receiver Holding Register
00774         AT91_REG         US_THR;        // Transmitter Holding Register
00775         AT91_REG         US_BRGR;       // Baud Rate Generator Register
00776         AT91_REG         US_RTOR;       // Receiver Time-out Register
00777         AT91_REG         US_TTGR;       // Transmitter Time-guard Register
00778         AT91_REG         Reserved0[5];  // 
00779         AT91_REG         US_FIDI;       // FI_DI_Ratio Register
00780         AT91_REG         US_NER;        // Nb Errors Register
00781         AT91_REG         Reserved1[1];  // 
00782         AT91_REG         US_IF;         // IRDA_FILTER Register
00783         AT91_REG         Reserved2[44];         // 
00784         AT91_REG         US_RPR;        // Receive Pointer Register
00785         AT91_REG         US_RCR;        // Receive Counter Register
00786         AT91_REG         US_TPR;        // Transmit Pointer Register
00787         AT91_REG         US_TCR;        // Transmit Counter Register
00788         AT91_REG         US_RNPR;       // Receive Next Pointer Register
00789         AT91_REG         US_RNCR;       // Receive Next Counter Register
00790         AT91_REG         US_TNPR;       // Transmit Next Pointer Register
00791         AT91_REG         US_TNCR;       // Transmit Next Counter Register
00792         AT91_REG         US_PTCR;       // PDC Transfer Control Register
00793         AT91_REG         US_PTSR;       // PDC Transfer Status Register
00794 } AT91S_USART, *AT91PS_USART;
00795 
00796 // -------- US_CR : (USART Offset: 0x0) Debug Unit Control Register -------- 
00797 #define AT91C_US_STTBRK       ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  9) // (USART) Start Break
00798 #define AT91C_US_STPBRK       ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 10) // (USART) Stop Break
00799 #define AT91C_US_STTTO        ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 11) // (USART) Start Time-out
00800 #define AT91C_US_SENDA        ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 12) // (USART) Send Address
00801 #define AT91C_US_RSTIT        ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 13) // (USART) Reset Iterations
00802 #define AT91C_US_RSTNACK      ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 14) // (USART) Reset Non Acknowledge
00803 #define AT91C_US_RETTO        ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 15) // (USART) Rearm Time-out
00804 #define AT91C_US_DTREN        ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 16) // (USART) Data Terminal ready Enable
00805 #define AT91C_US_DTRDIS       ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 17) // (USART) Data Terminal ready Disable
00806 #define AT91C_US_RTSEN        ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 18) // (USART) Request to Send enable
00807 #define AT91C_US_RTSDIS       ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 19) // (USART) Request to Send Disable
00808 // -------- US_MR : (USART Offset: 0x4) Debug Unit Mode Register -------- 
00809 #define AT91C_US_USMODE       ((unsigned int) 0xF <<  0) // (USART) Usart mode
00810 #define         AT91C_US_USMODE_NORMAL               ((unsigned int) 0x0) // (USART) Normal
00811 #define         AT91C_US_USMODE_RS485                ((unsigned int) 0x1) // (USART) RS485
00812 #define         AT91C_US_USMODE_HWHSH                ((unsigned int) 0x2) // (USART) Hardware Handshaking
00813 #define         AT91C_US_USMODE_MODEM                ((unsigned int) 0x3) // (USART) Modem
00814 #define         AT91C_US_USMODE_ISO7816_0            ((unsigned int) 0x4) // (USART) ISO7816 protocol: T = 0
00815 #define         AT91C_US_USMODE_ISO7816_1            ((unsigned int) 0x6) // (USART) ISO7816 protocol: T = 1
00816 #define         AT91C_US_USMODE_IRDA                 ((unsigned int) 0x8) // (USART) IrDA
00817 #define         AT91C_US_USMODE_SWHSH                ((unsigned int) 0xC) // (USART) Software Handshaking
00818 #define AT91C_US_CLKS         ((unsigned int) 0x3 <<  4) // (USART) Clock Selection (Baud Rate generator Input Clock
00819 #define         AT91C_US_CLKS_CLOCK                ((unsigned int) 0x0 <<  4) // (USART) Clock
00820 #define         AT91C_US_CLKS_FDIV1                ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  4) // (USART) fdiv1
00821 #define         AT91C_US_CLKS_SLOW                 ((unsigned int) 0x2 <<  4) // (USART) slow_clock (ARM)
00822 #define         AT91C_US_CLKS_EXT                  ((unsigned int) 0x3 <<  4) // (USART) External (SCK)
00823 #define AT91C_US_CHRL         ((unsigned int) 0x3 <<  6) // (USART) Clock Selection (Baud Rate generator Input Clock
00824 #define         AT91C_US_CHRL_5_BITS               ((unsigned int) 0x0 <<  6) // (USART) Character Length: 5 bits
00825 #define         AT91C_US_CHRL_6_BITS               ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  6) // (USART) Character Length: 6 bits
00826 #define         AT91C_US_CHRL_7_BITS               ((unsigned int) 0x2 <<  6) // (USART) Character Length: 7 bits
00827 #define         AT91C_US_CHRL_8_BITS               ((unsigned int) 0x3 <<  6) // (USART) Character Length: 8 bits
00828 #define AT91C_US_SYNC         ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  8) // (USART) Synchronous Mode Select
00829 #define AT91C_US_NBSTOP       ((unsigned int) 0x3 << 12) // (USART) Number of Stop bits
00830 #define         AT91C_US_NBSTOP_1_BIT                ((unsigned int) 0x0 << 12) // (USART) 1 stop bit
00831 #define         AT91C_US_NBSTOP_15_BIT               ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 12) // (USART) Asynchronous (SYNC=0) 2 stop bits Synchronous (SYNC=1) 2 stop bits
00832 #define         AT91C_US_NBSTOP_2_BIT                ((unsigned int) 0x2 << 12) // (USART) 2 stop bits
00833 #define AT91C_US_MSBF         ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 16) // (USART) Bit Order
00834 #define AT91C_US_MODE9        ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 17) // (USART) 9-bit Character length
00835 #define AT91C_US_CKLO         ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 18) // (USART) Clock Output Select
00836 #define AT91C_US_OVER         ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 19) // (USART) Over Sampling Mode
00837 #define AT91C_US_INACK        ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 20) // (USART) Inhibit Non Acknowledge
00838 #define AT91C_US_DSNACK       ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 21) // (USART) Disable Successive NACK
00839 #define AT91C_US_MAX_ITER     ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 24) // (USART) Number of Repetitions
00840 #define AT91C_US_FILTER       ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 28) // (USART) Receive Line Filter
00841 // -------- US_IER : (USART Offset: 0x8) Debug Unit Interrupt Enable Register -------- 
00842 #define AT91C_US_RXBRK        ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  2) // (USART) Break Received/End of Break
00843 #define AT91C_US_TIMEOUT      ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  8) // (USART) Receiver Time-out
00844 #define AT91C_US_ITERATION    ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 10) // (USART) Max number of Repetitions Reached
00845 #define AT91C_US_NACK         ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 13) // (USART) Non Acknowledge
00846 #define AT91C_US_RIIC         ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 16) // (USART) Ring INdicator Input Change Flag
00847 #define AT91C_US_DSRIC        ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 17) // (USART) Data Set Ready Input Change Flag
00848 #define AT91C_US_DCDIC        ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 18) // (USART) Data Carrier Flag
00849 #define AT91C_US_CTSIC        ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 19) // (USART) Clear To Send Input Change Flag
00850 // -------- US_IDR : (USART Offset: 0xc) Debug Unit Interrupt Disable Register -------- 
00851 // -------- US_IMR : (USART Offset: 0x10) Debug Unit Interrupt Mask Register -------- 
00852 // -------- US_CSR : (USART Offset: 0x14) Debug Unit Channel Status Register -------- 
00853 #define AT91C_US_RI           ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 20) // (USART) Image of RI Input
00854 #define AT91C_US_DSR          ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 21) // (USART) Image of DSR Input
00855 #define AT91C_US_DCD          ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 22) // (USART) Image of DCD Input
00856 #define AT91C_US_CTS          ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 23) // (USART) Image of CTS Input
00857 
00858 // *****************************************************************************
00859 //              SOFTWARE API DEFINITION  FOR Synchronous Serial Controller Interface
00860 // *****************************************************************************
00861 typedef struct _AT91S_SSC {
00862         AT91_REG         SSC_CR;        // Control Register
00863         AT91_REG         SSC_CMR;       // Clock Mode Register
00864         AT91_REG         Reserved0[2];  // 
00865         AT91_REG         SSC_RCMR;      // Receive Clock ModeRegister
00866         AT91_REG         SSC_RFMR;      // Receive Frame Mode Register
00867         AT91_REG         SSC_TCMR;      // Transmit Clock Mode Register
00868         AT91_REG         SSC_TFMR;      // Transmit Frame Mode Register
00869         AT91_REG         SSC_RHR;       // Receive Holding Register
00870         AT91_REG         SSC_THR;       // Transmit Holding Register
00871         AT91_REG         Reserved1[2];  // 
00872         AT91_REG         SSC_RSHR;      // Receive Sync Holding Register
00873         AT91_REG         SSC_TSHR;      // Transmit Sync Holding Register
00874         AT91_REG         Reserved2[2];  // 
00875         AT91_REG         SSC_SR;        // Status Register
00876         AT91_REG         SSC_IER;       // Interrupt Enable Register
00877         AT91_REG         SSC_IDR;       // Interrupt Disable Register
00878         AT91_REG         SSC_IMR;       // Interrupt Mask Register
00879         AT91_REG         Reserved3[44];         // 
00880         AT91_REG         SSC_RPR;       // Receive Pointer Register
00881         AT91_REG         SSC_RCR;       // Receive Counter Register
00882         AT91_REG         SSC_TPR;       // Transmit Pointer Register
00883         AT91_REG         SSC_TCR;       // Transmit Counter Register
00884         AT91_REG         SSC_RNPR;      // Receive Next Pointer Register
00885         AT91_REG         SSC_RNCR;      // Receive Next Counter Register
00886         AT91_REG         SSC_TNPR;      // Transmit Next Pointer Register
00887         AT91_REG         SSC_TNCR;      // Transmit Next Counter Register
00888         AT91_REG         SSC_PTCR;      // PDC Transfer Control Register
00889         AT91_REG         SSC_PTSR;      // PDC Transfer Status Register
00890 } AT91S_SSC, *AT91PS_SSC;
00891 
00892 // -------- SSC_CR : (SSC Offset: 0x0) SSC Control Register -------- 
00893 #define AT91C_SSC_RXEN        ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  0) // (SSC) Receive Enable
00894 #define AT91C_SSC_RXDIS       ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  1) // (SSC) Receive Disable
00895 #define AT91C_SSC_TXEN        ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  8) // (SSC) Transmit Enable
00896 #define AT91C_SSC_TXDIS       ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  9) // (SSC) Transmit Disable
00897 #define AT91C_SSC_SWRST       ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 15) // (SSC) Software Reset
00898 // -------- SSC_RCMR : (SSC Offset: 0x10) SSC Receive Clock Mode Register -------- 
00899 #define AT91C_SSC_CKS         ((unsigned int) 0x3 <<  0) // (SSC) Receive/Transmit Clock Selection
00900 #define         AT91C_SSC_CKS_DIV                  ((unsigned int) 0x0) // (SSC) Divided Clock
00901 #define         AT91C_SSC_CKS_TK                   ((unsigned int) 0x1) // (SSC) TK Clock signal
00902 #define         AT91C_SSC_CKS_RK                   ((unsigned int) 0x2) // (SSC) RK pin
00903 #define AT91C_SSC_CKO         ((unsigned int) 0x7 <<  2) // (SSC) Receive/Transmit Clock Output Mode Selection
00904 #define         AT91C_SSC_CKO_NONE                 ((unsigned int) 0x0 <<  2) // (SSC) Receive/Transmit Clock Output Mode: None RK pin: Input-only
00905 #define         AT91C_SSC_CKO_CONTINOUS            ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  2) // (SSC) Continuous Receive/Transmit Clock RK pin: Output
00906 #define         AT91C_SSC_CKO_DATA_TX              ((unsigned int) 0x2 <<  2) // (SSC) Receive/Transmit Clock only during data transfers RK pin: Output
00907 #define AT91C_SSC_CKI         ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  5) // (SSC) Receive/Transmit Clock Inversion
00908 #define AT91C_SSC_START       ((unsigned int) 0xF <<  8) // (SSC) Receive/Transmit Start Selection
00909 #define         AT91C_SSC_START_CONTINOUS            ((unsigned int) 0x0 <<  8) // (SSC) Continuous, as soon as the receiver is enabled, and immediately after the end of transfer of the previous data.
00910 #define         AT91C_SSC_START_TX                   ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  8) // (SSC) Transmit/Receive start
00911 #define         AT91C_SSC_START_LOW_RF               ((unsigned int) 0x2 <<  8) // (SSC) Detection of a low level on RF input
00912 #define         AT91C_SSC_START_HIGH_RF              ((unsigned int) 0x3 <<  8) // (SSC) Detection of a high level on RF input
00913 #define         AT91C_SSC_START_FALL_RF              ((unsigned int) 0x4 <<  8) // (SSC) Detection of a falling edge on RF input
00914 #define         AT91C_SSC_START_RISE_RF              ((unsigned int) 0x5 <<  8) // (SSC) Detection of a rising edge on RF input
00915 #define         AT91C_SSC_START_LEVEL_RF             ((unsigned int) 0x6 <<  8) // (SSC) Detection of any level change on RF input
00916 #define         AT91C_SSC_START_EDGE_RF              ((unsigned int) 0x7 <<  8) // (SSC) Detection of any edge on RF input
00917 #define         AT91C_SSC_START_0                    ((unsigned int) 0x8 <<  8) // (SSC) Compare 0
00918 #define AT91C_SSC_STTDLY      ((unsigned int) 0xFF << 16) // (SSC) Receive/Transmit Start Delay
00919 #define AT91C_SSC_PERIOD      ((unsigned int) 0xFF << 24) // (SSC) Receive/Transmit Period Divider Selection
00920 // -------- SSC_RFMR : (SSC Offset: 0x14) SSC Receive Frame Mode Register -------- 
00921 #define AT91C_SSC_DATLEN      ((unsigned int) 0x1F <<  0) // (SSC) Data Length
00922 #define AT91C_SSC_LOOP        ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  5) // (SSC) Loop Mode
00923 #define AT91C_SSC_MSBF        ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  7) // (SSC) Most Significant Bit First
00924 #define AT91C_SSC_DATNB       ((unsigned int) 0xF <<  8) // (SSC) Data Number per Frame
00925 #define AT91C_SSC_FSLEN       ((unsigned int) 0xF << 16) // (SSC) Receive/Transmit Frame Sync length
00926 #define AT91C_SSC_FSOS        ((unsigned int) 0x7 << 20) // (SSC) Receive/Transmit Frame Sync Output Selection
00927 #define         AT91C_SSC_FSOS_NONE                 ((unsigned int) 0x0 << 20) // (SSC) Selected Receive/Transmit Frame Sync Signal: None RK pin Input-only
00928 #define         AT91C_SSC_FSOS_NEGATIVE             ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 20) // (SSC) Selected Receive/Transmit Frame Sync Signal: Negative Pulse
00929 #define         AT91C_SSC_FSOS_POSITIVE             ((unsigned int) 0x2 << 20) // (SSC) Selected Receive/Transmit Frame Sync Signal: Positive Pulse
00930 #define         AT91C_SSC_FSOS_LOW                  ((unsigned int) 0x3 << 20) // (SSC) Selected Receive/Transmit Frame Sync Signal: Driver Low during data transfer
00931 #define         AT91C_SSC_FSOS_HIGH                 ((unsigned int) 0x4 << 20) // (SSC) Selected Receive/Transmit Frame Sync Signal: Driver High during data transfer
00932 #define         AT91C_SSC_FSOS_TOGGLE               ((unsigned int) 0x5 << 20) // (SSC) Selected Receive/Transmit Frame Sync Signal: Toggling at each start of data transfer
00933 #define AT91C_SSC_FSEDGE      ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 24) // (SSC) Frame Sync Edge Detection
00934 // -------- SSC_TCMR : (SSC Offset: 0x18) SSC Transmit Clock Mode Register -------- 
00935 // -------- SSC_TFMR : (SSC Offset: 0x1c) SSC Transmit Frame Mode Register -------- 
00936 #define AT91C_SSC_DATDEF      ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  5) // (SSC) Data Default Value
00937 #define AT91C_SSC_FSDEN       ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 23) // (SSC) Frame Sync Data Enable
00938 // -------- SSC_SR : (SSC Offset: 0x40) SSC Status Register -------- 
00939 #define AT91C_SSC_TXRDY       ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  0) // (SSC) Transmit Ready
00940 #define AT91C_SSC_TXEMPTY     ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  1) // (SSC) Transmit Empty
00941 #define AT91C_SSC_ENDTX       ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  2) // (SSC) End Of Transmission
00942 #define AT91C_SSC_TXBUFE      ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  3) // (SSC) Transmit Buffer Empty
00943 #define AT91C_SSC_RXRDY       ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  4) // (SSC) Receive Ready
00944 #define AT91C_SSC_OVRUN       ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  5) // (SSC) Receive Overrun
00945 #define AT91C_SSC_ENDRX       ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  6) // (SSC) End of Reception
00946 #define AT91C_SSC_RXBUFF      ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  7) // (SSC) Receive Buffer Full
00947 #define AT91C_SSC_TXSYN       ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 10) // (SSC) Transmit Sync
00948 #define AT91C_SSC_RXSYN       ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 11) // (SSC) Receive Sync
00949 #define AT91C_SSC_TXENA       ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 16) // (SSC) Transmit Enable
00950 #define AT91C_SSC_RXENA       ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 17) // (SSC) Receive Enable
00951 // -------- SSC_IER : (SSC Offset: 0x44) SSC Interrupt Enable Register -------- 
00952 // -------- SSC_IDR : (SSC Offset: 0x48) SSC Interrupt Disable Register -------- 
00953 // -------- SSC_IMR : (SSC Offset: 0x4c) SSC Interrupt Mask Register -------- 
00954 
00955 // *****************************************************************************
00956 //              SOFTWARE API DEFINITION  FOR Two-wire Interface
00957 // *****************************************************************************
00958 typedef struct _AT91S_TWI {
00959         AT91_REG         TWI_CR;        // Control Register
00960         AT91_REG         TWI_MMR;       // Master Mode Register
00961         AT91_REG         Reserved0[1];  // 
00962         AT91_REG         TWI_IADR;      // Internal Address Register
00963         AT91_REG         TWI_CWGR;      // Clock Waveform Generator Register
00964         AT91_REG         Reserved1[3];  // 
00965         AT91_REG         TWI_SR;        // Status Register
00966         AT91_REG         TWI_IER;       // Interrupt Enable Register
00967         AT91_REG         TWI_IDR;       // Interrupt Disable Register
00968         AT91_REG         TWI_IMR;       // Interrupt Mask Register
00969         AT91_REG         TWI_RHR;       // Receive Holding Register
00970         AT91_REG         TWI_THR;       // Transmit Holding Register
00971 } AT91S_TWI, *AT91PS_TWI;
00972 
00973 // -------- TWI_CR : (TWI Offset: 0x0) TWI Control Register -------- 
00974 #define AT91C_TWI_START       ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  0) // (TWI) Send a START Condition
00975 #define AT91C_TWI_STOP        ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  1) // (TWI) Send a STOP Condition
00976 #define AT91C_TWI_MSEN        ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  2) // (TWI) TWI Master Transfer Enabled
00977 #define AT91C_TWI_MSDIS       ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  3) // (TWI) TWI Master Transfer Disabled
00978 #define AT91C_TWI_SWRST       ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  7) // (TWI) Software Reset
00979 // -------- TWI_MMR : (TWI Offset: 0x4) TWI Master Mode Register -------- 
00980 #define AT91C_TWI_IADRSZ      ((unsigned int) 0x3 <<  8) // (TWI) Internal Device Address Size
00981 #define         AT91C_TWI_IADRSZ_NO                   ((unsigned int) 0x0 <<  8) // (TWI) No internal device address
00982 #define         AT91C_TWI_IADRSZ_1_BYTE               ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  8) // (TWI) One-byte internal device address
00983 #define         AT91C_TWI_IADRSZ_2_BYTE               ((unsigned int) 0x2 <<  8) // (TWI) Two-byte internal device address
00984 #define         AT91C_TWI_IADRSZ_3_BYTE               ((unsigned int) 0x3 <<  8) // (TWI) Three-byte internal device address
00985 #define AT91C_TWI_MREAD       ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 12) // (TWI) Master Read Direction
00986 #define AT91C_TWI_DADR        ((unsigned int) 0x7F << 16) // (TWI) Device Address
00987 // -------- TWI_CWGR : (TWI Offset: 0x10) TWI Clock Waveform Generator Register -------- 
00988 #define AT91C_TWI_CLDIV       ((unsigned int) 0xFF <<  0) // (TWI) Clock Low Divider
00989 #define AT91C_TWI_CHDIV       ((unsigned int) 0xFF <<  8) // (TWI) Clock High Divider
00990 #define AT91C_TWI_CKDIV       ((unsigned int) 0x7 << 16) // (TWI) Clock Divider
00991 // -------- TWI_SR : (TWI Offset: 0x20) TWI Status Register -------- 
00992 #define AT91C_TWI_TXCOMP      ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  0) // (TWI) Transmission Completed
00993 #define AT91C_TWI_RXRDY       ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  1) // (TWI) Receive holding register ReaDY
00994 #define AT91C_TWI_TXRDY       ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  2) // (TWI) Transmit holding register ReaDY
00995 #define AT91C_TWI_OVRE        ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  6) // (TWI) Overrun Error
00996 #define AT91C_TWI_UNRE        ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  7) // (TWI) Underrun Error
00997 #define AT91C_TWI_NACK        ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  8) // (TWI) Not Acknowledged
00998 // -------- TWI_IER : (TWI Offset: 0x24) TWI Interrupt Enable Register -------- 
00999 // -------- TWI_IDR : (TWI Offset: 0x28) TWI Interrupt Disable Register -------- 
01000 // -------- TWI_IMR : (TWI Offset: 0x2c) TWI Interrupt Mask Register -------- 
01001 
01002 // *****************************************************************************
01003 //              SOFTWARE API DEFINITION  FOR PWMC Channel Interface
01004 // *****************************************************************************
01005 typedef struct _AT91S_PWMC_CH {
01006         AT91_REG         PWMC_CMR;      // Channel Mode Register
01007         AT91_REG         PWMC_CDTYR;    // Channel Duty Cycle Register
01008         AT91_REG         PWMC_CPRDR;    // Channel Period Register
01009         AT91_REG         PWMC_CCNTR;    // Channel Counter Register
01010         AT91_REG         PWMC_CUPDR;    // Channel Update Register
01011         AT91_REG         PWMC_Reserved[3];      // Reserved
01012 } AT91S_PWMC_CH, *AT91PS_PWMC_CH;
01013 
01014 // -------- PWMC_CMR : (PWMC_CH Offset: 0x0) PWMC Channel Mode Register -------- 
01015 #define AT91C_PWMC_CPRE       ((unsigned int) 0xF <<  0) // (PWMC_CH) Channel Pre-scaler : PWMC_CLKx
01016 #define         AT91C_PWMC_CPRE_MCK                  ((unsigned int) 0x0) // (PWMC_CH) 
01017 #define         AT91C_PWMC_CPRE_MCKA                 ((unsigned int) 0xB) // (PWMC_CH) 
01018 #define         AT91C_PWMC_CPRE_MCKB                 ((unsigned int) 0xC) // (PWMC_CH) 
01019 #define AT91C_PWMC_CALG       ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  8) // (PWMC_CH) Channel Alignment
01020 #define AT91C_PWMC_CPOL       ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  9) // (PWMC_CH) Channel Polarity
01021 #define AT91C_PWMC_CPD        ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 10) // (PWMC_CH) Channel Update Period
01022 // -------- PWMC_CDTYR : (PWMC_CH Offset: 0x4) PWMC Channel Duty Cycle Register -------- 
01023 #define AT91C_PWMC_CDTY       ((unsigned int) 0x0 <<  0) // (PWMC_CH) Channel Duty Cycle
01024 // -------- PWMC_CPRDR : (PWMC_CH Offset: 0x8) PWMC Channel Period Register -------- 
01025 #define AT91C_PWMC_CPRD       ((unsigned int) 0x0 <<  0) // (PWMC_CH) Channel Period
01026 // -------- PWMC_CCNTR : (PWMC_CH Offset: 0xc) PWMC Channel Counter Register -------- 
01027 #define AT91C_PWMC_CCNT       ((unsigned int) 0x0 <<  0) // (PWMC_CH) Channel Counter
01028 // -------- PWMC_CUPDR : (PWMC_CH Offset: 0x10) PWMC Channel Update Register -------- 
01029 #define AT91C_PWMC_CUPD       ((unsigned int) 0x0 <<  0) // (PWMC_CH) Channel Update
01030 
01031 // *****************************************************************************
01032 //              SOFTWARE API DEFINITION  FOR Pulse Width Modulation Controller Interface
01033 // *****************************************************************************
01034 typedef struct _AT91S_PWMC {
01035         AT91_REG         PWMC_MR;       // PWMC Mode Register
01036         AT91_REG         PWMC_ENA;      // PWMC Enable Register
01037         AT91_REG         PWMC_DIS;      // PWMC Disable Register
01038         AT91_REG         PWMC_SR;       // PWMC Status Register
01039         AT91_REG         PWMC_IER;      // PWMC Interrupt Enable Register
01040         AT91_REG         PWMC_IDR;      // PWMC Interrupt Disable Register
01041         AT91_REG         PWMC_IMR;      // PWMC Interrupt Mask Register
01042         AT91_REG         PWMC_ISR;      // PWMC Interrupt Status Register
01043         AT91_REG         Reserved0[55];         // 
01044         AT91_REG         PWMC_VR;       // PWMC Version Register
01045         AT91_REG         Reserved1[64];         // 
01046         AT91S_PWMC_CH    PWMC_CH[4];    // PWMC Channel
01047 } AT91S_PWMC, *AT91PS_PWMC;
01048 
01049 // -------- PWMC_MR : (PWMC Offset: 0x0) PWMC Mode Register -------- 
01050 #define AT91C_PWMC_DIVA       ((unsigned int) 0xFF <<  0) // (PWMC) CLKA divide factor.
01051 #define AT91C_PWMC_PREA       ((unsigned int) 0xF <<  8) // (PWMC) Divider Input Clock Prescaler A
01052 #define         AT91C_PWMC_PREA_MCK                  ((unsigned int) 0x0 <<  8) // (PWMC) 
01053 #define AT91C_PWMC_DIVB       ((unsigned int) 0xFF << 16) // (PWMC) CLKB divide factor.
01054 #define AT91C_PWMC_PREB       ((unsigned int) 0xF << 24) // (PWMC) Divider Input Clock Prescaler B
01055 #define         AT91C_PWMC_PREB_MCK                  ((unsigned int) 0x0 << 24) // (PWMC) 
01056 // -------- PWMC_ENA : (PWMC Offset: 0x4) PWMC Enable Register -------- 
01057 #define AT91C_PWMC_CHID0      ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  0) // (PWMC) Channel ID 0
01058 #define AT91C_PWMC_CHID1      ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  1) // (PWMC) Channel ID 1
01059 #define AT91C_PWMC_CHID2      ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  2) // (PWMC) Channel ID 2
01060 #define AT91C_PWMC_CHID3      ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  3) // (PWMC) Channel ID 3
01061 // -------- PWMC_DIS : (PWMC Offset: 0x8) PWMC Disable Register -------- 
01062 // -------- PWMC_SR : (PWMC Offset: 0xc) PWMC Status Register -------- 
01063 // -------- PWMC_IER : (PWMC Offset: 0x10) PWMC Interrupt Enable Register -------- 
01064 // -------- PWMC_IDR : (PWMC Offset: 0x14) PWMC Interrupt Disable Register -------- 
01065 // -------- PWMC_IMR : (PWMC Offset: 0x18) PWMC Interrupt Mask Register -------- 
01066 // -------- PWMC_ISR : (PWMC Offset: 0x1c) PWMC Interrupt Status Register -------- 
01067 
01068 // *****************************************************************************
01069 //              SOFTWARE API DEFINITION  FOR USB Device Interface
01070 // *****************************************************************************
01071 typedef struct _AT91S_UDP {
01072         AT91_REG         UDP_NUM;       // Frame Number Register
01073         AT91_REG         UDP_GLBSTATE;  // Global State Register
01074         AT91_REG         UDP_FADDR;     // Function Address Register
01075         AT91_REG         Reserved0[1];  // 
01076         AT91_REG         UDP_IER;       // Interrupt Enable Register
01077         AT91_REG         UDP_IDR;       // Interrupt Disable Register
01078         AT91_REG         UDP_IMR;       // Interrupt Mask Register
01079         AT91_REG         UDP_ISR;       // Interrupt Status Register
01080         AT91_REG         UDP_ICR;       // Interrupt Clear Register
01081         AT91_REG         Reserved1[1];  // 
01082         AT91_REG         UDP_RSTEP;     // Reset Endpoint Register
01083         AT91_REG         Reserved2[1];  // 
01084         AT91_REG         UDP_CSR[6];    // Endpoint Control and Status Register
01085         AT91_REG         Reserved3[2];  // 
01086         AT91_REG         UDP_FDR[6];    // Endpoint FIFO Data Register
01087         AT91_REG         Reserved4[3];  // 
01088         AT91_REG         UDP_TXVC;      // Transceiver Control Register
01089 } AT91S_UDP, *AT91PS_UDP;
01090 
01091 // -------- UDP_FRM_NUM : (UDP Offset: 0x0) USB Frame Number Register -------- 
01092 #define AT91C_UDP_FRM_NUM     ((unsigned int) 0x7FF <<  0) // (UDP) Frame Number as Defined in the Packet Field Formats
01093 #define AT91C_UDP_FRM_ERR     ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 16) // (UDP) Frame Error
01094 #define AT91C_UDP_FRM_OK      ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 17) // (UDP) Frame OK
01095 // -------- UDP_GLB_STATE : (UDP Offset: 0x4) USB Global State Register -------- 
01096 #define AT91C_UDP_FADDEN      ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  0) // (UDP) Function Address Enable
01097 #define AT91C_UDP_CONFG       ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  1) // (UDP) Configured
01098 #define AT91C_UDP_ESR         ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  2) // (UDP) Enable Send Resume
01099 #define AT91C_UDP_RSMINPR     ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  3) // (UDP) A Resume Has Been Sent to the Host
01100 #define AT91C_UDP_RMWUPE      ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  4) // (UDP) Remote Wake Up Enable
01101 // -------- UDP_FADDR : (UDP Offset: 0x8) USB Function Address Register -------- 
01102 #define AT91C_UDP_FADD        ((unsigned int) 0xFF <<  0) // (UDP) Function Address Value
01103 #define AT91C_UDP_FEN         ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  8) // (UDP) Function Enable
01104 // -------- UDP_IER : (UDP Offset: 0x10) USB Interrupt Enable Register -------- 
01105 #define AT91C_UDP_EPINT0      ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  0) // (UDP) Endpoint 0 Interrupt
01106 #define AT91C_UDP_EPINT1      ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  1) // (UDP) Endpoint 0 Interrupt
01107 #define AT91C_UDP_EPINT2      ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  2) // (UDP) Endpoint 2 Interrupt
01108 #define AT91C_UDP_EPINT3      ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  3) // (UDP) Endpoint 3 Interrupt
01109 #define AT91C_UDP_EPINT4      ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  4) // (UDP) Endpoint 4 Interrupt
01110 #define AT91C_UDP_EPINT5      ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  5) // (UDP) Endpoint 5 Interrupt
01111 #define AT91C_UDP_RXSUSP      ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  8) // (UDP) USB Suspend Interrupt
01112 #define AT91C_UDP_RXRSM       ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  9) // (UDP) USB Resume Interrupt
01113 #define AT91C_UDP_EXTRSM      ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 10) // (UDP) USB External Resume Interrupt
01114 #define AT91C_UDP_SOFINT      ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 11) // (UDP) USB Start Of frame Interrupt
01115 #define AT91C_UDP_WAKEUP      ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 13) // (UDP) USB Resume Interrupt
01116 // -------- UDP_IDR : (UDP Offset: 0x14) USB Interrupt Disable Register -------- 
01117 // -------- UDP_IMR : (UDP Offset: 0x18) USB Interrupt Mask Register -------- 
01118 // -------- UDP_ISR : (UDP Offset: 0x1c) USB Interrupt Status Register -------- 
01119 #define AT91C_UDP_ENDBUSRES   ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 12) // (UDP) USB End Of Bus Reset Interrupt
01120 // -------- UDP_ICR : (UDP Offset: 0x20) USB Interrupt Clear Register -------- 
01121 // -------- UDP_RST_EP : (UDP Offset: 0x28) USB Reset Endpoint Register -------- 
01122 #define AT91C_UDP_EP0         ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  0) // (UDP) Reset Endpoint 0
01123 #define AT91C_UDP_EP1         ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  1) // (UDP) Reset Endpoint 1
01124 #define AT91C_UDP_EP2         ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  2) // (UDP) Reset Endpoint 2
01125 #define AT91C_UDP_EP3         ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  3) // (UDP) Reset Endpoint 3
01126 #define AT91C_UDP_EP4         ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  4) // (UDP) Reset Endpoint 4
01127 #define AT91C_UDP_EP5         ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  5) // (UDP) Reset Endpoint 5
01128 // -------- UDP_CSR : (UDP Offset: 0x30) USB Endpoint Control and Status Register -------- 
01129 #define AT91C_UDP_TXCOMP      ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  0) // (UDP) Generates an IN packet with data previously written in the DPR
01130 #define AT91C_UDP_RX_DATA_BK0 ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  1) // (UDP) Receive Data Bank 0
01131 #define AT91C_UDP_RXSETUP     ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  2) // (UDP) Sends STALL to the Host (Control endpoints)
01132 #define AT91C_UDP_ISOERROR    ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  3) // (UDP) Isochronous error (Isochronous endpoints)
01133 #define AT91C_UDP_TXPKTRDY    ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  4) // (UDP) Transmit Packet Ready
01134 #define AT91C_UDP_FORCESTALL  ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  5) // (UDP) Force Stall (used by Control, Bulk and Isochronous endpoints).
01135 #define AT91C_UDP_RX_DATA_BK1 ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  6) // (UDP) Receive Data Bank 1 (only used by endpoints with ping-pong attributes).
01136 #define AT91C_UDP_DIR         ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  7) // (UDP) Transfer Direction
01137 #define AT91C_UDP_EPTYPE      ((unsigned int) 0x7 <<  8) // (UDP) Endpoint type
01138 #define         AT91C_UDP_EPTYPE_CTRL                 ((unsigned int) 0x0 <<  8) // (UDP) Control
01139 #define         AT91C_UDP_EPTYPE_ISO_OUT              ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  8) // (UDP) Isochronous OUT
01140 #define         AT91C_UDP_EPTYPE_BULK_OUT             ((unsigned int) 0x2 <<  8) // (UDP) Bulk OUT
01141 #define         AT91C_UDP_EPTYPE_INT_OUT              ((unsigned int) 0x3 <<  8) // (UDP) Interrupt OUT
01142 #define         AT91C_UDP_EPTYPE_ISO_IN               ((unsigned int) 0x5 <<  8) // (UDP) Isochronous IN
01143 #define         AT91C_UDP_EPTYPE_BULK_IN              ((unsigned int) 0x6 <<  8) // (UDP) Bulk IN
01144 #define         AT91C_UDP_EPTYPE_INT_IN               ((unsigned int) 0x7 <<  8) // (UDP) Interrupt IN
01145 #define AT91C_UDP_DTGLE       ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 11) // (UDP) Data Toggle
01146 #define AT91C_UDP_EPEDS       ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 15) // (UDP) Endpoint Enable Disable
01147 #define AT91C_UDP_RXBYTECNT   ((unsigned int) 0x7FF << 16) // (UDP) Number Of Bytes Available in the FIFO
01148 // -------- UDP_TXVC : (UDP Offset: 0x74) Transceiver Control Register -------- 
01149 #define AT91C_UDP_TXVDIS      ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  8) // (UDP) 
01150 #define AT91C_UDP_PUON        ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  9) // (UDP) Pull-up ON
01151 
01152 // *****************************************************************************
01153 //              SOFTWARE API DEFINITION  FOR Timer Counter Channel Interface
01154 // *****************************************************************************
01155 typedef struct _AT91S_TC {
01156         AT91_REG         TC_CCR;        // Channel Control Register
01157         AT91_REG         TC_CMR;        // Channel Mode Register (Capture Mode / Waveform Mode)
01158         AT91_REG         Reserved0[2];  // 
01159         AT91_REG         TC_CV;         // Counter Value
01160         AT91_REG         TC_RA;         // Register A
01161         AT91_REG         TC_RB;         // Register B
01162         AT91_REG         TC_RC;         // Register C
01163         AT91_REG         TC_SR;         // Status Register
01164         AT91_REG         TC_IER;        // Interrupt Enable Register
01165         AT91_REG         TC_IDR;        // Interrupt Disable Register
01166         AT91_REG         TC_IMR;        // Interrupt Mask Register
01167 } AT91S_TC, *AT91PS_TC;
01168 
01169 // -------- TC_CCR : (TC Offset: 0x0) TC Channel Control Register -------- 
01170 #define AT91C_TC_CLKEN        ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  0) // (TC) Counter Clock Enable Command
01171 #define AT91C_TC_CLKDIS       ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  1) // (TC) Counter Clock Disable Command
01172 #define AT91C_TC_SWTRG        ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  2) // (TC) Software Trigger Command
01173 // -------- TC_CMR : (TC Offset: 0x4) TC Channel Mode Register: Capture Mode / Waveform Mode -------- 
01174 #define AT91C_TC_CLKS         ((unsigned int) 0x7 <<  0) // (TC) Clock Selection
01175 #define         AT91C_TC_CLKS_TIMER_DIV1_CLOCK     ((unsigned int) 0x0) // (TC) Clock selected: TIMER_DIV1_CLOCK
01176 #define         AT91C_TC_CLKS_TIMER_DIV2_CLOCK     ((unsigned int) 0x1) // (TC) Clock selected: TIMER_DIV2_CLOCK
01177 #define         AT91C_TC_CLKS_TIMER_DIV3_CLOCK     ((unsigned int) 0x2) // (TC) Clock selected: TIMER_DIV3_CLOCK
01178 #define         AT91C_TC_CLKS_TIMER_DIV4_CLOCK     ((unsigned int) 0x3) // (TC) Clock selected: TIMER_DIV4_CLOCK
01179 #define         AT91C_TC_CLKS_TIMER_DIV5_CLOCK     ((unsigned int) 0x4) // (TC) Clock selected: TIMER_DIV5_CLOCK
01180 #define         AT91C_TC_CLKS_XC0                  ((unsigned int) 0x5) // (TC) Clock selected: XC0
01181 #define         AT91C_TC_CLKS_XC1                  ((unsigned int) 0x6) // (TC) Clock selected: XC1
01182 #define         AT91C_TC_CLKS_XC2                  ((unsigned int) 0x7) // (TC) Clock selected: XC2
01183 #define AT91C_TC_CLKI         ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  3) // (TC) Clock Invert
01184 #define AT91C_TC_BURST        ((unsigned int) 0x3 <<  4) // (TC) Burst Signal Selection
01185 #define         AT91C_TC_BURST_NONE                 ((unsigned int) 0x0 <<  4) // (TC) The clock is not gated by an external signal
01186 #define         AT91C_TC_BURST_XC0                  ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  4) // (TC) XC0 is ANDed with the selected clock
01187 #define         AT91C_TC_BURST_XC1                  ((unsigned int) 0x2 <<  4) // (TC) XC1 is ANDed with the selected clock
01188 #define         AT91C_TC_BURST_XC2                  ((unsigned int) 0x3 <<  4) // (TC) XC2 is ANDed with the selected clock
01189 #define AT91C_TC_CPCSTOP      ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  6) // (TC) Counter Clock Stopped with RC Compare
01190 #define AT91C_TC_LDBSTOP      ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  6) // (TC) Counter Clock Stopped with RB Loading
01191 #define AT91C_TC_CPCDIS       ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  7) // (TC) Counter Clock Disable with RC Compare
01192 #define AT91C_TC_LDBDIS       ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  7) // (TC) Counter Clock Disabled with RB Loading
01193 #define AT91C_TC_ETRGEDG      ((unsigned int) 0x3 <<  8) // (TC) External Trigger Edge Selection
01194 #define         AT91C_TC_ETRGEDG_NONE                 ((unsigned int) 0x0 <<  8) // (TC) Edge: None
01195 #define         AT91C_TC_ETRGEDG_RISING               ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  8) // (TC) Edge: rising edge
01196 #define         AT91C_TC_ETRGEDG_FALLING              ((unsigned int) 0x2 <<  8) // (TC) Edge: falling edge
01197 #define         AT91C_TC_ETRGEDG_BOTH                 ((unsigned int) 0x3 <<  8) // (TC) Edge: each edge
01198 #define AT91C_TC_EEVTEDG      ((unsigned int) 0x3 <<  8) // (TC) External Event Edge Selection
01199 #define         AT91C_TC_EEVTEDG_NONE                 ((unsigned int) 0x0 <<  8) // (TC) Edge: None
01200 #define         AT91C_TC_EEVTEDG_RISING               ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  8) // (TC) Edge: rising edge
01201 #define         AT91C_TC_EEVTEDG_FALLING              ((unsigned int) 0x2 <<  8) // (TC) Edge: falling edge
01202 #define         AT91C_TC_EEVTEDG_BOTH                 ((unsigned int) 0x3 <<  8) // (TC) Edge: each edge
01203 #define AT91C_TC_EEVT         ((unsigned int) 0x3 << 10) // (TC) External Event  Selection
01204 #define         AT91C_TC_EEVT_TIOB                 ((unsigned int) 0x0 << 10) // (TC) Signal selected as external event: TIOB TIOB direction: input
01205 #define         AT91C_TC_EEVT_XC0                  ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 10) // (TC) Signal selected as external event: XC0 TIOB direction: output
01206 #define         AT91C_TC_EEVT_XC1                  ((unsigned int) 0x2 << 10) // (TC) Signal selected as external event: XC1 TIOB direction: output
01207 #define         AT91C_TC_EEVT_XC2                  ((unsigned int) 0x3 << 10) // (TC) Signal selected as external event: XC2 TIOB direction: output
01208 #define AT91C_TC_ABETRG       ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 10) // (TC) TIOA or TIOB External Trigger Selection
01209 #define AT91C_TC_ENETRG       ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 12) // (TC) External Event Trigger enable
01210 #define AT91C_TC_WAVESEL      ((unsigned int) 0x3 << 13) // (TC) Waveform  Selection
01211 #define         AT91C_TC_WAVESEL_UP                   ((unsigned int) 0x0 << 13) // (TC) UP mode without atomatic trigger on RC Compare
01212 #define         AT91C_TC_WAVESEL_UPDOWN               ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 13) // (TC) UPDOWN mode without automatic trigger on RC Compare
01213 #define         AT91C_TC_WAVESEL_UP_AUTO              ((unsigned int) 0x2 << 13) // (TC) UP mode with automatic trigger on RC Compare
01214 #define         AT91C_TC_WAVESEL_UPDOWN_AUTO          ((unsigned int) 0x3 << 13) // (TC) UPDOWN mode with automatic trigger on RC Compare
01215 #define AT91C_TC_CPCTRG       ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 14) // (TC) RC Compare Trigger Enable
01216 #define AT91C_TC_WAVE         ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 15) // (TC) 
01217 #define AT91C_TC_ACPA         ((unsigned int) 0x3 << 16) // (TC) RA Compare Effect on TIOA
01218 #define         AT91C_TC_ACPA_NONE                 ((unsigned int) 0x0 << 16) // (TC) Effect: none
01219 #define         AT91C_TC_ACPA_SET                  ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 16) // (TC) Effect: set
01220 #define         AT91C_TC_ACPA_CLEAR                ((unsigned int) 0x2 << 16) // (TC) Effect: clear
01221 #define         AT91C_TC_ACPA_TOGGLE               ((unsigned int) 0x3 << 16) // (TC) Effect: toggle
01222 #define AT91C_TC_LDRA         ((unsigned int) 0x3 << 16) // (TC) RA Loading Selection
01223 #define         AT91C_TC_LDRA_NONE                 ((unsigned int) 0x0 << 16) // (TC) Edge: None
01224 #define         AT91C_TC_LDRA_RISING               ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 16) // (TC) Edge: rising edge of TIOA
01225 #define         AT91C_TC_LDRA_FALLING              ((unsigned int) 0x2 << 16) // (TC) Edge: falling edge of TIOA
01226 #define         AT91C_TC_LDRA_BOTH                 ((unsigned int) 0x3 << 16) // (TC) Edge: each edge of TIOA
01227 #define AT91C_TC_ACPC         ((unsigned int) 0x3 << 18) // (TC) RC Compare Effect on TIOA
01228 #define         AT91C_TC_ACPC_NONE                 ((unsigned int) 0x0 << 18) // (TC) Effect: none
01229 #define         AT91C_TC_ACPC_SET                  ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 18) // (TC) Effect: set
01230 #define         AT91C_TC_ACPC_CLEAR                ((unsigned int) 0x2 << 18) // (TC) Effect: clear
01231 #define         AT91C_TC_ACPC_TOGGLE               ((unsigned int) 0x3 << 18) // (TC) Effect: toggle
01232 #define AT91C_TC_LDRB         ((unsigned int) 0x3 << 18) // (TC) RB Loading Selection
01233 #define         AT91C_TC_LDRB_NONE                 ((unsigned int) 0x0 << 18) // (TC) Edge: None
01234 #define         AT91C_TC_LDRB_RISING               ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 18) // (TC) Edge: rising edge of TIOA
01235 #define         AT91C_TC_LDRB_FALLING              ((unsigned int) 0x2 << 18) // (TC) Edge: falling edge of TIOA
01236 #define         AT91C_TC_LDRB_BOTH                 ((unsigned int) 0x3 << 18) // (TC) Edge: each edge of TIOA
01237 #define AT91C_TC_AEEVT        ((unsigned int) 0x3 << 20) // (TC) External Event Effect on TIOA
01238 #define         AT91C_TC_AEEVT_NONE                 ((unsigned int) 0x0 << 20) // (TC) Effect: none
01239 #define         AT91C_TC_AEEVT_SET                  ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 20) // (TC) Effect: set
01240 #define         AT91C_TC_AEEVT_CLEAR                ((unsigned int) 0x2 << 20) // (TC) Effect: clear
01241 #define         AT91C_TC_AEEVT_TOGGLE               ((unsigned int) 0x3 << 20) // (TC) Effect: toggle
01242 #define AT91C_TC_ASWTRG       ((unsigned int) 0x3 << 22) // (TC) Software Trigger Effect on TIOA
01243 #define         AT91C_TC_ASWTRG_NONE                 ((unsigned int) 0x0 << 22) // (TC) Effect: none
01244 #define         AT91C_TC_ASWTRG_SET                  ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 22) // (TC) Effect: set
01245 #define         AT91C_TC_ASWTRG_CLEAR                ((unsigned int) 0x2 << 22) // (TC) Effect: clear
01246 #define         AT91C_TC_ASWTRG_TOGGLE               ((unsigned int) 0x3 << 22) // (TC) Effect: toggle
01247 #define AT91C_TC_BCPB         ((unsigned int) 0x3 << 24) // (TC) RB Compare Effect on TIOB
01248 #define         AT91C_TC_BCPB_NONE                 ((unsigned int) 0x0 << 24) // (TC) Effect: none
01249 #define         AT91C_TC_BCPB_SET                  ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 24) // (TC) Effect: set
01250 #define         AT91C_TC_BCPB_CLEAR                ((unsigned int) 0x2 << 24) // (TC) Effect: clear
01251 #define         AT91C_TC_BCPB_TOGGLE               ((unsigned int) 0x3 << 24) // (TC) Effect: toggle
01252 #define AT91C_TC_BCPC         ((unsigned int) 0x3 << 26) // (TC) RC Compare Effect on TIOB
01253 #define         AT91C_TC_BCPC_NONE                 ((unsigned int) 0x0 << 26) // (TC) Effect: none
01254 #define         AT91C_TC_BCPC_SET                  ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 26) // (TC) Effect: set
01255 #define         AT91C_TC_BCPC_CLEAR                ((unsigned int) 0x2 << 26) // (TC) Effect: clear
01256 #define         AT91C_TC_BCPC_TOGGLE               ((unsigned int) 0x3 << 26) // (TC) Effect: toggle
01257 #define AT91C_TC_BEEVT        ((unsigned int) 0x3 << 28) // (TC) External Event Effect on TIOB
01258 #define         AT91C_TC_BEEVT_NONE                 ((unsigned int) 0x0 << 28) // (TC) Effect: none
01259 #define         AT91C_TC_BEEVT_SET                  ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 28) // (TC) Effect: set
01260 #define         AT91C_TC_BEEVT_CLEAR                ((unsigned int) 0x2 << 28) // (TC) Effect: clear
01261 #define         AT91C_TC_BEEVT_TOGGLE               ((unsigned int) 0x3 << 28) // (TC) Effect: toggle
01262 #define AT91C_TC_BSWTRG       ((unsigned int) 0x3 << 30) // (TC) Software Trigger Effect on TIOB
01263 #define         AT91C_TC_BSWTRG_NONE                 ((unsigned int) 0x0 << 30) // (TC) Effect: none
01264 #define         AT91C_TC_BSWTRG_SET                  ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 30) // (TC) Effect: set
01265 #define         AT91C_TC_BSWTRG_CLEAR                ((unsigned int) 0x2 << 30) // (TC) Effect: clear
01266 #define         AT91C_TC_BSWTRG_TOGGLE               ((unsigned int) 0x3 << 30) // (TC) Effect: toggle
01267 // -------- TC_SR : (TC Offset: 0x20) TC Channel Status Register -------- 
01268 #define AT91C_TC_COVFS        ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  0) // (TC) Counter Overflow
01269 #define AT91C_TC_LOVRS        ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  1) // (TC) Load Overrun
01270 #define AT91C_TC_CPAS         ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  2) // (TC) RA Compare
01271 #define AT91C_TC_CPBS         ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  3) // (TC) RB Compare
01272 #define AT91C_TC_CPCS         ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  4) // (TC) RC Compare
01273 #define AT91C_TC_LDRAS        ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  5) // (TC) RA Loading
01274 #define AT91C_TC_LDRBS        ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  6) // (TC) RB Loading
01275 #define AT91C_TC_ETRGS        ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  7) // (TC) External Trigger
01276 #define AT91C_TC_CLKSTA       ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 16) // (TC) Clock Enabling
01277 #define AT91C_TC_MTIOA        ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 17) // (TC) TIOA Mirror
01278 #define AT91C_TC_MTIOB        ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 18) // (TC) TIOA Mirror
01279 // -------- TC_IER : (TC Offset: 0x24) TC Channel Interrupt Enable Register -------- 
01280 // -------- TC_IDR : (TC Offset: 0x28) TC Channel Interrupt Disable Register -------- 
01281 // -------- TC_IMR : (TC Offset: 0x2c) TC Channel Interrupt Mask Register -------- 
01282 
01283 // *****************************************************************************
01284 //              SOFTWARE API DEFINITION  FOR Timer Counter Interface
01285 // *****************************************************************************
01286 typedef struct _AT91S_TCB {
01287         AT91S_TC         TCB_TC0;       // TC Channel 0
01288         AT91_REG         Reserved0[4];  // 
01289         AT91S_TC         TCB_TC1;       // TC Channel 1
01290         AT91_REG         Reserved1[4];  // 
01291         AT91S_TC         TCB_TC2;       // TC Channel 2
01292         AT91_REG         Reserved2[4];  // 
01293         AT91_REG         TCB_BCR;       // TC Block Control Register
01294         AT91_REG         TCB_BMR;       // TC Block Mode Register
01295 } AT91S_TCB, *AT91PS_TCB;
01296 
01297 // -------- TCB_BCR : (TCB Offset: 0xc0) TC Block Control Register -------- 
01298 #define AT91C_TCB_SYNC        ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  0) // (TCB) Synchro Command
01299 // -------- TCB_BMR : (TCB Offset: 0xc4) TC Block Mode Register -------- 
01300 #define AT91C_TCB_TC0XC0S     ((unsigned int) 0x3 <<  0) // (TCB) External Clock Signal 0 Selection
01301 #define         AT91C_TCB_TC0XC0S_TCLK0                ((unsigned int) 0x0) // (TCB) TCLK0 connected to XC0
01302 #define         AT91C_TCB_TC0XC0S_NONE                 ((unsigned int) 0x1) // (TCB) None signal connected to XC0
01303 #define         AT91C_TCB_TC0XC0S_TIOA1                ((unsigned int) 0x2) // (TCB) TIOA1 connected to XC0
01304 #define         AT91C_TCB_TC0XC0S_TIOA2                ((unsigned int) 0x3) // (TCB) TIOA2 connected to XC0
01305 #define AT91C_TCB_TC1XC1S     ((unsigned int) 0x3 <<  2) // (TCB) External Clock Signal 1 Selection
01306 #define         AT91C_TCB_TC1XC1S_TCLK1                ((unsigned int) 0x0 <<  2) // (TCB) TCLK1 connected to XC1
01307 #define         AT91C_TCB_TC1XC1S_NONE                 ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  2) // (TCB) None signal connected to XC1
01308 #define         AT91C_TCB_TC1XC1S_TIOA0                ((unsigned int) 0x2 <<  2) // (TCB) TIOA0 connected to XC1
01309 #define         AT91C_TCB_TC1XC1S_TIOA2                ((unsigned int) 0x3 <<  2) // (TCB) TIOA2 connected to XC1
01310 #define AT91C_TCB_TC2XC2S     ((unsigned int) 0x3 <<  4) // (TCB) External Clock Signal 2 Selection
01311 #define         AT91C_TCB_TC2XC2S_TCLK2                ((unsigned int) 0x0 <<  4) // (TCB) TCLK2 connected to XC2
01312 #define         AT91C_TCB_TC2XC2S_NONE                 ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  4) // (TCB) None signal connected to XC2
01313 #define         AT91C_TCB_TC2XC2S_TIOA0                ((unsigned int) 0x2 <<  4) // (TCB) TIOA0 connected to XC2
01314 #define         AT91C_TCB_TC2XC2S_TIOA1                ((unsigned int) 0x3 <<  4) // (TCB) TIOA2 connected to XC2
01315 
01316 // *****************************************************************************
01317 //              SOFTWARE API DEFINITION  FOR Control Area Network MailBox Interface
01318 // *****************************************************************************
01319 typedef struct _AT91S_CAN_MB {
01320         AT91_REG         CAN_MB_MMR;    // MailBox Mode Register
01321         AT91_REG         CAN_MB_MAM;    // MailBox Acceptance Mask Register
01322         AT91_REG         CAN_MB_MID;    // MailBox ID Register
01323         AT91_REG         CAN_MB_MFID;   // MailBox Family ID Register
01324         AT91_REG         CAN_MB_MSR;    // MailBox Status Register
01325         AT91_REG         CAN_MB_MDL;    // MailBox Data Low Register
01326         AT91_REG         CAN_MB_MDH;    // MailBox Data High Register
01327         AT91_REG         CAN_MB_MCR;    // MailBox Control Register
01328 } AT91S_CAN_MB, *AT91PS_CAN_MB;
01329 
01330 // -------- CAN_MMR : (CAN_MB Offset: 0x0) CAN Message Mode Register -------- 
01331 #define AT91C_CAN_MTIMEMARK   ((unsigned int) 0xFFFF <<  0) // (CAN_MB) Mailbox Timemark
01332 #define AT91C_CAN_PRIOR       ((unsigned int) 0xF << 16) // (CAN_MB) Mailbox Priority
01333 #define AT91C_CAN_MOT         ((unsigned int) 0x7 << 24) // (CAN_MB) Mailbox Object Type
01334 #define         AT91C_CAN_MOT_DIS                  ((unsigned int) 0x0 << 24) // (CAN_MB) 
01335 #define         AT91C_CAN_MOT_RX                   ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 24) // (CAN_MB) 
01336 #define         AT91C_CAN_MOT_RXOVERWRITE          ((unsigned int) 0x2 << 24) // (CAN_MB) 
01337 #define         AT91C_CAN_MOT_TX                   ((unsigned int) 0x3 << 24) // (CAN_MB) 
01338 #define         AT91C_CAN_MOT_CONSUMER             ((unsigned int) 0x4 << 24) // (CAN_MB) 
01339 #define         AT91C_CAN_MOT_PRODUCER             ((unsigned int) 0x5 << 24) // (CAN_MB) 
01340 // -------- CAN_MAM : (CAN_MB Offset: 0x4) CAN Message Acceptance Mask Register -------- 
01341 #define AT91C_CAN_MIDvB       ((unsigned int) 0x3FFFF <<  0) // (CAN_MB) Complementary bits for identifier in extended mode
01342 #define AT91C_CAN_MIDvA       ((unsigned int) 0x7FF << 18) // (CAN_MB) Identifier for standard frame mode
01343 #define AT91C_CAN_MIDE        ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 29) // (CAN_MB) Identifier Version
01344 // -------- CAN_MID : (CAN_MB Offset: 0x8) CAN Message ID Register -------- 
01345 // -------- CAN_MFID : (CAN_MB Offset: 0xc) CAN Message Family ID Register -------- 
01346 // -------- CAN_MSR : (CAN_MB Offset: 0x10) CAN Message Status Register -------- 
01347 #define AT91C_CAN_MTIMESTAMP  ((unsigned int) 0xFFFF <<  0) // (CAN_MB) Timer Value
01348 #define AT91C_CAN_MDLC        ((unsigned int) 0xF << 16) // (CAN_MB) Mailbox Data Length Code
01349 #define AT91C_CAN_MRTR        ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 20) // (CAN_MB) Mailbox Remote Transmission Request
01350 #define AT91C_CAN_MABT        ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 22) // (CAN_MB) Mailbox Message Abort
01351 #define AT91C_CAN_MRDY        ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 23) // (CAN_MB) Mailbox Ready
01352 #define AT91C_CAN_MMI         ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 24) // (CAN_MB) Mailbox Message Ignored
01353 // -------- CAN_MDL : (CAN_MB Offset: 0x14) CAN Message Data Low Register -------- 
01354 // -------- CAN_MDH : (CAN_MB Offset: 0x18) CAN Message Data High Register -------- 
01355 // -------- CAN_MCR : (CAN_MB Offset: 0x1c) CAN Message Control Register -------- 
01356 #define AT91C_CAN_MACR        ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 22) // (CAN_MB) Abort Request for Mailbox
01357 #define AT91C_CAN_MTCR        ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 23) // (CAN_MB) Mailbox Transfer Command
01358 
01359 // *****************************************************************************
01360 //              SOFTWARE API DEFINITION  FOR Control Area Network Interface
01361 // *****************************************************************************
01362 typedef struct _AT91S_CAN {
01363         AT91_REG         CAN_MR;        // Mode Register
01364         AT91_REG         CAN_IER;       // Interrupt Enable Register
01365         AT91_REG         CAN_IDR;       // Interrupt Disable Register
01366         AT91_REG         CAN_IMR;       // Interrupt Mask Register
01367         AT91_REG         CAN_SR;        // Status Register
01368         AT91_REG         CAN_BR;        // Baudrate Register
01369         AT91_REG         CAN_TIM;       // Timer Register
01370         AT91_REG         CAN_TIMESTP;   // Time Stamp Register
01371         AT91_REG         CAN_ECR;       // Error Counter Register
01372         AT91_REG         CAN_TCR;       // Transfer Command Register
01373         AT91_REG         CAN_ACR;       // Abort Command Register
01374         AT91_REG         Reserved0[52];         // 
01375         AT91_REG         CAN_VR;        // Version Register
01376         AT91_REG         Reserved1[64];         // 
01377         AT91S_CAN_MB     CAN_MB0;       // CAN Mailbox 0
01378         AT91S_CAN_MB     CAN_MB1;       // CAN Mailbox 1
01379         AT91S_CAN_MB     CAN_MB2;       // CAN Mailbox 2
01380         AT91S_CAN_MB     CAN_MB3;       // CAN Mailbox 3
01381         AT91S_CAN_MB     CAN_MB4;       // CAN Mailbox 4
01382         AT91S_CAN_MB     CAN_MB5;       // CAN Mailbox 5
01383         AT91S_CAN_MB     CAN_MB6;       // CAN Mailbox 6
01384         AT91S_CAN_MB     CAN_MB7;       // CAN Mailbox 7
01385         AT91S_CAN_MB     CAN_MB8;       // CAN Mailbox 8
01386         AT91S_CAN_MB     CAN_MB9;       // CAN Mailbox 9
01387         AT91S_CAN_MB     CAN_MB10;      // CAN Mailbox 10
01388         AT91S_CAN_MB     CAN_MB11;      // CAN Mailbox 11
01389         AT91S_CAN_MB     CAN_MB12;      // CAN Mailbox 12
01390         AT91S_CAN_MB     CAN_MB13;      // CAN Mailbox 13
01391         AT91S_CAN_MB     CAN_MB14;      // CAN Mailbox 14
01392         AT91S_CAN_MB     CAN_MB15;      // CAN Mailbox 15
01393 } AT91S_CAN, *AT91PS_CAN;
01394 
01395 // -------- CAN_MR : (CAN Offset: 0x0) CAN Mode Register -------- 
01396 #define AT91C_CAN_CANEN       ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  0) // (CAN) CAN Controller Enable
01397 #define AT91C_CAN_LPM         ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  1) // (CAN) Disable/Enable Low Power Mode
01398 #define AT91C_CAN_ABM         ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  2) // (CAN) Disable/Enable Autobaud/Listen Mode
01399 #define AT91C_CAN_OVL         ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  3) // (CAN) Disable/Enable Overload Frame
01400 #define AT91C_CAN_TEOF        ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  4) // (CAN) Time Stamp messages at each end of Frame
01401 #define AT91C_CAN_TTM         ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  5) // (CAN) Disable/Enable Time Trigger Mode
01402 #define AT91C_CAN_TIMFRZ      ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  6) // (CAN) Enable Timer Freeze
01403 #define AT91C_CAN_DRPT        ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  7) // (CAN) Disable Repeat
01404 // -------- CAN_IER : (CAN Offset: 0x4) CAN Interrupt Enable Register -------- 
01405 #define AT91C_CAN_MB0         ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  0) // (CAN) Mailbox 0 Flag
01406 #define AT91C_CAN_MB1         ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  1) // (CAN) Mailbox 1 Flag
01407 #define AT91C_CAN_MB2         ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  2) // (CAN) Mailbox 2 Flag
01408 #define AT91C_CAN_MB3         ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  3) // (CAN) Mailbox 3 Flag
01409 #define AT91C_CAN_MB4         ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  4) // (CAN) Mailbox 4 Flag
01410 #define AT91C_CAN_MB5         ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  5) // (CAN) Mailbox 5 Flag
01411 #define AT91C_CAN_MB6         ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  6) // (CAN) Mailbox 6 Flag
01412 #define AT91C_CAN_MB7         ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  7) // (CAN) Mailbox 7 Flag
01413 #define AT91C_CAN_MB8         ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  8) // (CAN) Mailbox 8 Flag
01414 #define AT91C_CAN_MB9         ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  9) // (CAN) Mailbox 9 Flag
01415 #define AT91C_CAN_MB10        ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 10) // (CAN) Mailbox 10 Flag
01416 #define AT91C_CAN_MB11        ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 11) // (CAN) Mailbox 11 Flag
01417 #define AT91C_CAN_MB12        ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 12) // (CAN) Mailbox 12 Flag
01418 #define AT91C_CAN_MB13        ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 13) // (CAN) Mailbox 13 Flag
01419 #define AT91C_CAN_MB14        ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 14) // (CAN) Mailbox 14 Flag
01420 #define AT91C_CAN_MB15        ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 15) // (CAN) Mailbox 15 Flag
01421 #define AT91C_CAN_ERRA        ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 16) // (CAN) Error Active Mode Flag
01422 #define AT91C_CAN_WARN        ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 17) // (CAN) Warning Limit Flag
01423 #define AT91C_CAN_ERRP        ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 18) // (CAN) Error Passive Mode Flag
01424 #define AT91C_CAN_BOFF        ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 19) // (CAN) Bus Off Mode Flag
01425 #define AT91C_CAN_SLEEP       ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 20) // (CAN) Sleep Flag
01426 #define AT91C_CAN_WAKEUP      ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 21) // (CAN) Wakeup Flag
01427 #define AT91C_CAN_TOVF        ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 22) // (CAN) Timer Overflow Flag
01428 #define AT91C_CAN_TSTP        ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 23) // (CAN) Timestamp Flag
01429 #define AT91C_CAN_CERR        ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 24) // (CAN) CRC Error
01430 #define AT91C_CAN_SERR        ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 25) // (CAN) Stuffing Error
01431 #define AT91C_CAN_AERR        ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 26) // (CAN) Acknowledgment Error
01432 #define AT91C_CAN_FERR        ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 27) // (CAN) Form Error
01433 #define AT91C_CAN_BERR        ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 28) // (CAN) Bit Error
01434 // -------- CAN_IDR : (CAN Offset: 0x8) CAN Interrupt Disable Register -------- 
01435 // -------- CAN_IMR : (CAN Offset: 0xc) CAN Interrupt Mask Register -------- 
01436 // -------- CAN_SR : (CAN Offset: 0x10) CAN Status Register -------- 
01437 #define AT91C_CAN_RBSY        ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 29) // (CAN) Receiver Busy
01438 #define AT91C_CAN_TBSY        ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 30) // (CAN) Transmitter Busy
01439 #define AT91C_CAN_OVLY        ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 31) // (CAN) Overload Busy
01440 // -------- CAN_BR : (CAN Offset: 0x14) CAN Baudrate Register -------- 
01441 #define AT91C_CAN_PHASE2      ((unsigned int) 0x7 <<  0) // (CAN) Phase 2 segment
01442 #define AT91C_CAN_PHASE1      ((unsigned int) 0x7 <<  4) // (CAN) Phase 1 segment
01443 #define AT91C_CAN_PROPAG      ((unsigned int) 0x7 <<  8) // (CAN) Programmation time segment
01444 #define AT91C_CAN_SYNC        ((unsigned int) 0x3 << 12) // (CAN) Re-synchronization jump width segment
01445 #define AT91C_CAN_BRP         ((unsigned int) 0x7F << 16) // (CAN) Baudrate Prescaler
01446 #define AT91C_CAN_SMP         ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 24) // (CAN) Sampling mode
01447 // -------- CAN_TIM : (CAN Offset: 0x18) CAN Timer Register -------- 
01448 #define AT91C_CAN_TIMER       ((unsigned int) 0xFFFF <<  0) // (CAN) Timer field
01449 // -------- CAN_TIMESTP : (CAN Offset: 0x1c) CAN Timestamp Register -------- 
01450 // -------- CAN_ECR : (CAN Offset: 0x20) CAN Error Counter Register -------- 
01451 #define AT91C_CAN_REC         ((unsigned int) 0xFF <<  0) // (CAN) Receive Error Counter
01452 #define AT91C_CAN_TEC         ((unsigned int) 0xFF << 16) // (CAN) Transmit Error Counter
01453 // -------- CAN_TCR : (CAN Offset: 0x24) CAN Transfer Command Register -------- 
01454 #define AT91C_CAN_TIMRST      ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 31) // (CAN) Timer Reset Field
01455 // -------- CAN_ACR : (CAN Offset: 0x28) CAN Abort Command Register -------- 
01456 
01457 // *****************************************************************************
01458 //              SOFTWARE API DEFINITION  FOR Ethernet MAC 10/100
01459 // *****************************************************************************
01460 typedef struct _AT91S_EMAC {
01461         AT91_REG         EMAC_NCR;      // Network Control Register
01462         AT91_REG         EMAC_NCFGR;    // Network Configuration Register
01463         AT91_REG         EMAC_NSR;      // Network Status Register
01464         AT91_REG         Reserved0[2];  // 
01465         AT91_REG         EMAC_TSR;      // Transmit Status Register
01466         AT91_REG         EMAC_RBQP;     // Receive Buffer Queue Pointer
01467         AT91_REG         EMAC_TBQP;     // Transmit Buffer Queue Pointer
01468         AT91_REG         EMAC_RSR;      // Receive Status Register
01469         AT91_REG         EMAC_ISR;      // Interrupt Status Register
01470         AT91_REG         EMAC_IER;      // Interrupt Enable Register
01471         AT91_REG         EMAC_IDR;      // Interrupt Disable Register
01472         AT91_REG         EMAC_IMR;      // Interrupt Mask Register
01473         AT91_REG         EMAC_MAN;      // PHY Maintenance Register
01474         AT91_REG         EMAC_PTR;      // Pause Time Register
01475         AT91_REG         EMAC_PFR;      // Pause Frames received Register
01476         AT91_REG         EMAC_FTO;      // Frames Transmitted OK Register
01477         AT91_REG         EMAC_SCF;      // Single Collision Frame Register
01478         AT91_REG         EMAC_MCF;      // Multiple Collision Frame Register
01479         AT91_REG         EMAC_FRO;      // Frames Received OK Register
01480         AT91_REG         EMAC_FCSE;     // Frame Check Sequence Error Register
01481         AT91_REG         EMAC_ALE;      // Alignment Error Register
01482         AT91_REG         EMAC_DTF;      // Deferred Transmission Frame Register
01483         AT91_REG         EMAC_LCOL;     // Late Collision Register
01484         AT91_REG         EMAC_ECOL;     // Excessive Collision Register
01485         AT91_REG         EMAC_TUND;     // Transmit Underrun Error Register
01486         AT91_REG         EMAC_CSE;      // Carrier Sense Error Register
01487         AT91_REG         EMAC_RRE;      // Receive Ressource Error Register
01488         AT91_REG         EMAC_ROV;      // Receive Overrun Errors Register
01489         AT91_REG         EMAC_RSE;      // Receive Symbol Errors Register
01490         AT91_REG         EMAC_ELE;      // Excessive Length Errors Register
01491         AT91_REG         EMAC_RJA;      // Receive Jabbers Register
01492         AT91_REG         EMAC_USF;      // Undersize Frames Register
01493         AT91_REG         EMAC_STE;      // SQE Test Error Register
01494         AT91_REG         EMAC_RLE;      // Receive Length Field Mismatch Register
01495         AT91_REG         EMAC_TPF;      // Transmitted Pause Frames Register
01496         AT91_REG         EMAC_HRB;      // Hash Address Bottom[31:0]
01497         AT91_REG         EMAC_HRT;      // Hash Address Top[63:32]
01498         AT91_REG         EMAC_SA1L;     // Specific Address 1 Bottom, First 4 bytes
01499         AT91_REG         EMAC_SA1H;     // Specific Address 1 Top, Last 2 bytes
01500         AT91_REG         EMAC_SA2L;     // Specific Address 2 Bottom, First 4 bytes
01501         AT91_REG         EMAC_SA2H;     // Specific Address 2 Top, Last 2 bytes
01502         AT91_REG         EMAC_SA3L;     // Specific Address 3 Bottom, First 4 bytes
01503         AT91_REG         EMAC_SA3H;     // Specific Address 3 Top, Last 2 bytes
01504         AT91_REG         EMAC_SA4L;     // Specific Address 4 Bottom, First 4 bytes
01505         AT91_REG         EMAC_SA4H;     // Specific Address 4 Top, Last 2 bytes
01506         AT91_REG         EMAC_TID;      // Type ID Checking Register
01507         AT91_REG         EMAC_TPQ;      // Transmit Pause Quantum Register
01508         AT91_REG         EMAC_USRIO;    // USER Input/Output Register
01509         AT91_REG         EMAC_WOL;      // Wake On LAN Register
01510         AT91_REG         Reserved1[13];         // 
01511         AT91_REG         EMAC_REV;      // Revision Register
01512 } AT91S_EMAC, *AT91PS_EMAC;

01514 // -------- EMAC_NCR : (EMAC Offset: 0x0)  -------- 
01515 #define AT91C_EMAC_LB         ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  0) // (EMAC) Loopback. Optional. When set, loopback signal is at high level.
01516 #define AT91C_EMAC_LLB        ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  1) // (EMAC) Loopback local. 
01517 #define AT91C_EMAC_RE         ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  2) // (EMAC) Receive enable. 
01518 #define AT91C_EMAC_TE         ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  3) // (EMAC) Transmit enable. 
01519 #define AT91C_EMAC_MPE        ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  4) // (EMAC) Management port enable. 
01520 #define AT91C_EMAC_CLRSTAT    ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  5) // (EMAC) Clear statistics registers. 
01521 #define AT91C_EMAC_INCSTAT    ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  6) // (EMAC) Increment statistics registers. 
01522 #define AT91C_EMAC_WESTAT     ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  7) // (EMAC) Write enable for statistics registers. 
01523 #define AT91C_EMAC_BP         ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  8) // (EMAC) Back pressure. 
01524 #define AT91C_EMAC_TSTART     ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  9) // (EMAC) Start Transmission. 
01525 #define AT91C_EMAC_THALT      ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 10) // (EMAC) Transmission Halt. 
01526 #define AT91C_EMAC_TPFR       ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 11) // (EMAC) Transmit pause frame 
01527 #define AT91C_EMAC_TZQ        ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 12) // (EMAC) Transmit zero quantum pause frame
01528 // -------- EMAC_NCFGR : (EMAC Offset: 0x4) Network Configuration Register -------- 
01529 #define AT91C_EMAC_SPD        ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  0) // (EMAC) Speed. 
01530 #define AT91C_EMAC_FD         ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  1) // (EMAC) Full duplex. 
01531 #define AT91C_EMAC_JFRAME     ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  3) // (EMAC) Jumbo Frames. 
01532 #define AT91C_EMAC_CAF        ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  4) // (EMAC) Copy all frames. 
01533 #define AT91C_EMAC_NBC        ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  5) // (EMAC) No broadcast. 
01534 #define AT91C_EMAC_MTI        ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  6) // (EMAC) Multicast hash event enable
01535 #define AT91C_EMAC_UNI        ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  7) // (EMAC) Unicast hash enable. 
01536 #define AT91C_EMAC_BIG        ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  8) // (EMAC) Receive 1522 bytes. 
01537 #define AT91C_EMAC_EAE        ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  9) // (EMAC) External address match enable. 
01538 #define AT91C_EMAC_CLK        ((unsigned int) 0x3 << 10) // (EMAC) 
01539 #define         AT91C_EMAC_CLK_HCLK_8               ((unsigned int) 0x0 << 10) // (EMAC) HCLK divided by 8
01540 #define         AT91C_EMAC_CLK_HCLK_16              ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 10) // (EMAC) HCLK divided by 16
01541 #define         AT91C_EMAC_CLK_HCLK_32              ((unsigned int) 0x2 << 10) // (EMAC) HCLK divided by 32
01542 #define         AT91C_EMAC_CLK_HCLK_64              ((unsigned int) 0x3 << 10) // (EMAC) HCLK divided by 64
01543 #define AT91C_EMAC_RTY        ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 12) // (EMAC) 
01544 #define AT91C_EMAC_PAE        ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 13) // (EMAC) 
01545 #define AT91C_EMAC_RBOF       ((unsigned int) 0x3 << 14) // (EMAC) 
01546 #define         AT91C_EMAC_RBOF_OFFSET_0             ((unsigned int) 0x0 << 14) // (EMAC) no offset from start of receive buffer
01547 #define         AT91C_EMAC_RBOF_OFFSET_1             ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 14) // (EMAC) one byte offset from start of receive buffer
01548 #define         AT91C_EMAC_RBOF_OFFSET_2             ((unsigned int) 0x2 << 14) // (EMAC) two bytes offset from start of receive buffer
01549 #define         AT91C_EMAC_RBOF_OFFSET_3             ((unsigned int) 0x3 << 14) // (EMAC) three bytes offset from start of receive buffer
01550 #define AT91C_EMAC_RLCE       ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 16) // (EMAC) Receive Length field Checking Enable
01551 #define AT91C_EMAC_DRFCS      ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 17) // (EMAC) Discard Receive FCS
01552 #define AT91C_EMAC_EFRHD      ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 18) // (EMAC) 
01553 #define AT91C_EMAC_IRXFCS     ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 19) // (EMAC) Ignore RX FCS
01554 // -------- EMAC_NSR : (EMAC Offset: 0x8) Network Status Register -------- 
01555 #define AT91C_EMAC_LINKR      ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  0) // (EMAC) 
01556 #define AT91C_EMAC_MDIO       ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  1) // (EMAC) 
01557 #define AT91C_EMAC_IDLE       ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  2) // (EMAC) 
01558 // -------- EMAC_TSR : (EMAC Offset: 0x14) Transmit Status Register -------- 
01559 #define AT91C_EMAC_UBR        ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  0) // (EMAC) 
01560 #define AT91C_EMAC_COL        ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  1) // (EMAC) 
01561 #define AT91C_EMAC_RLES       ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  2) // (EMAC) 
01562 #define AT91C_EMAC_TGO        ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  3) // (EMAC) Transmit Go
01563 #define AT91C_EMAC_BEX        ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  4) // (EMAC) Buffers exhausted mid frame
01564 #define AT91C_EMAC_COMP       ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  5) // (EMAC) 
01565 #define AT91C_EMAC_UND        ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  6) // (EMAC) 
01566 // -------- EMAC_RSR : (EMAC Offset: 0x20) Receive Status Register -------- 
01567 #define AT91C_EMAC_BNA        ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  0) // (EMAC) 
01568 #define AT91C_EMAC_REC        ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  1) // (EMAC) 
01569 #define AT91C_EMAC_OVR        ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  2) // (EMAC) 
01570 // -------- EMAC_ISR : (EMAC Offset: 0x24) Interrupt Status Register -------- 
01571 #define AT91C_EMAC_MFD        ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  0) // (EMAC) 
01572 #define AT91C_EMAC_RCOMP      ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  1) // (EMAC) 
01573 #define AT91C_EMAC_RXUBR      ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  2) // (EMAC) 
01574 #define AT91C_EMAC_TXUBR      ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  3) // (EMAC) 
01575 #define AT91C_EMAC_TUNDR      ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  4) // (EMAC) 
01576 #define AT91C_EMAC_RLEX       ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  5) // (EMAC) 
01577 #define AT91C_EMAC_TXERR      ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  6) // (EMAC) 
01578 #define AT91C_EMAC_TCOMP      ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  7) // (EMAC) 
01579 #define AT91C_EMAC_LINK       ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  9) // (EMAC) 
01580 #define AT91C_EMAC_ROVR       ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 10) // (EMAC) 
01581 #define AT91C_EMAC_HRESP      ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 11) // (EMAC) 
01582 #define AT91C_EMAC_PFRE       ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 12) // (EMAC) 
01583 #define AT91C_EMAC_PTZ        ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 13) // (EMAC) 
01584 // -------- EMAC_IER : (EMAC Offset: 0x28) Interrupt Enable Register -------- 
01585 // -------- EMAC_IDR : (EMAC Offset: 0x2c) Interrupt Disable Register -------- 
01586 // -------- EMAC_IMR : (EMAC Offset: 0x30) Interrupt Mask Register -------- 
01587 // -------- EMAC_MAN : (EMAC Offset: 0x34) PHY Maintenance Register -------- 
01588 #define AT91C_EMAC_DATA       ((unsigned int) 0xFFFF <<  0) // (EMAC) 
01589 #define AT91C_EMAC_CODE       ((unsigned int) 0x3 << 16) // (EMAC) 
01590 #define AT91C_EMAC_REGA       ((unsigned int) 0x1F << 18) // (EMAC) 
01591 #define AT91C_EMAC_PHYA       ((unsigned int) 0x1F << 23) // (EMAC) 
01592 #define AT91C_EMAC_RW         ((unsigned int) 0x3 << 28) // (EMAC) 
01593 #define AT91C_EMAC_SOF        ((unsigned int) 0x3 << 30) // (EMAC) 
01594 // -------- EMAC_USRIO : (EMAC Offset: 0xc0) USER Input Output Register -------- 
01595 #define AT91C_EMAC_RMII       ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  0) // (EMAC) Reduce MII
01596 // -------- EMAC_WOL : (EMAC Offset: 0xc4) Wake On LAN Register -------- 
01597 #define AT91C_EMAC_IP         ((unsigned int) 0xFFFF <<  0) // (EMAC) ARP request IP address
01598 #define AT91C_EMAC_MAG        ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 16) // (EMAC) Magic packet event enable
01599 #define AT91C_EMAC_ARP        ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 17) // (EMAC) ARP request event enable
01600 #define AT91C_EMAC_SA1        ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 18) // (EMAC) Specific address register 1 event enable
01601 // -------- EMAC_REV : (EMAC Offset: 0xfc) Revision Register -------- 
01602 #define AT91C_EMAC_REVREF     ((unsigned int) 0xFFFF <<  0) // (EMAC) 
01603 #define AT91C_EMAC_PARTREF    ((unsigned int) 0xFFFF << 16) // (EMAC)

01605 // *****************************************************************************
01606 //              SOFTWARE API DEFINITION  FOR Analog to Digital Convertor
01607 // *****************************************************************************
01608 typedef struct _AT91S_ADC {
01609         AT91_REG         ADC_CR;        // ADC Control Register
01610         AT91_REG         ADC_MR;        // ADC Mode Register
01611         AT91_REG         Reserved0[2];  // 
01612         AT91_REG         ADC_CHER;      // ADC Channel Enable Register
01613         AT91_REG         ADC_CHDR;      // ADC Channel Disable Register
01614         AT91_REG         ADC_CHSR;      // ADC Channel Status Register
01615         AT91_REG         ADC_SR;        // ADC Status Register
01616         AT91_REG         ADC_LCDR;      // ADC Last Converted Data Register
01617         AT91_REG         ADC_IER;       // ADC Interrupt Enable Register
01618         AT91_REG         ADC_IDR;       // ADC Interrupt Disable Register
01619         AT91_REG         ADC_IMR;       // ADC Interrupt Mask Register
01620         AT91_REG         ADC_CDR0;      // ADC Channel Data Register 0
01621         AT91_REG         ADC_CDR1;      // ADC Channel Data Register 1
01622         AT91_REG         ADC_CDR2;      // ADC Channel Data Register 2
01623         AT91_REG         ADC_CDR3;      // ADC Channel Data Register 3
01624         AT91_REG         ADC_CDR4;      // ADC Channel Data Register 4
01625         AT91_REG         ADC_CDR5;      // ADC Channel Data Register 5
01626         AT91_REG         ADC_CDR6;      // ADC Channel Data Register 6
01627         AT91_REG         ADC_CDR7;      // ADC Channel Data Register 7
01628         AT91_REG         Reserved1[44];         // 
01629         AT91_REG         ADC_RPR;       // Receive Pointer Register
01630         AT91_REG         ADC_RCR;       // Receive Counter Register
01631         AT91_REG         ADC_TPR;       // Transmit Pointer Register
01632         AT91_REG         ADC_TCR;       // Transmit Counter Register
01633         AT91_REG         ADC_RNPR;      // Receive Next Pointer Register
01634         AT91_REG         ADC_RNCR;      // Receive Next Counter Register
01635         AT91_REG         ADC_TNPR;      // Transmit Next Pointer Register
01636         AT91_REG         ADC_TNCR;      // Transmit Next Counter Register
01637         AT91_REG         ADC_PTCR;      // PDC Transfer Control Register
01638         AT91_REG         ADC_PTSR;      // PDC Transfer Status Register
01639 } AT91S_ADC, *AT91PS_ADC;
