01641 // -------- ADC_CR : (ADC Offset: 0x0) ADC Control Register -------- 
01642 #define AT91C_ADC_SWRST       ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  0) // (ADC) Software Reset
01643 #define AT91C_ADC_START       ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  1) // (ADC) Start Conversion
01644 // -------- ADC_MR : (ADC Offset: 0x4) ADC Mode Register -------- 
01645 #define AT91C_ADC_TRGEN       ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  0) // (ADC) Trigger Enable
01646 #define         AT91C_ADC_TRGEN_DIS                  ((unsigned int) 0x0) // (ADC) Hradware triggers are disabled. Starting a conversion is only possible by software
01647 #define         AT91C_ADC_TRGEN_EN                   ((unsigned int) 0x1) // (ADC) Hardware trigger selected by TRGSEL field is enabled.
01648 #define AT91C_ADC_TRGSEL      ((unsigned int) 0x7 <<  1) // (ADC) Trigger Selection
01649 #define         AT91C_ADC_TRGSEL_TIOA0                ((unsigned int) 0x0 <<  1) // (ADC) Selected TRGSEL = TIAO0
01650 #define         AT91C_ADC_TRGSEL_TIOA1                ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  1) // (ADC) Selected TRGSEL = TIAO1
01651 #define         AT91C_ADC_TRGSEL_TIOA2                ((unsigned int) 0x2 <<  1) // (ADC) Selected TRGSEL = TIAO2
01652 #define         AT91C_ADC_TRGSEL_TIOA3                ((unsigned int) 0x3 <<  1) // (ADC) Selected TRGSEL = TIAO3
01653 #define         AT91C_ADC_TRGSEL_TIOA4                ((unsigned int) 0x4 <<  1) // (ADC) Selected TRGSEL = TIAO4
01654 #define         AT91C_ADC_TRGSEL_TIOA5                ((unsigned int) 0x5 <<  1) // (ADC) Selected TRGSEL = TIAO5
01655 #define         AT91C_ADC_TRGSEL_EXT                  ((unsigned int) 0x6 <<  1) // (ADC) Selected TRGSEL = External Trigger
01656 #define AT91C_ADC_LOWRES      ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  4) // (ADC) Resolution.
01657 #define         AT91C_ADC_LOWRES_10_BIT               ((unsigned int) 0x0 <<  4) // (ADC) 10-bit resolution
01658 #define         AT91C_ADC_LOWRES_8_BIT                ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  4) // (ADC) 8-bit resolution
01659 #define AT91C_ADC_SLEEP       ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  5) // (ADC) Sleep Mode
01660 #define         AT91C_ADC_SLEEP_NORMAL_MODE          ((unsigned int) 0x0 <<  5) // (ADC) Normal Mode
01661 #define         AT91C_ADC_SLEEP_MODE                 ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  5) // (ADC) Sleep Mode
01662 #define AT91C_ADC_PRESCAL     ((unsigned int) 0x3F <<  8) // (ADC) Prescaler rate selection
01663 #define AT91C_ADC_STARTUP     ((unsigned int) 0x1F << 16) // (ADC) Startup Time
01664 #define AT91C_ADC_SHTIM       ((unsigned int) 0xF << 24) // (ADC) Sample & Hold Time
01665 // --------     ADC_CHER : (ADC Offset: 0x10) ADC Channel Enable Register -------- 
01666 #define AT91C_ADC_CH0         ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  0) // (ADC) Channel 0
01667 #define AT91C_ADC_CH1         ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  1) // (ADC) Channel 1
01668 #define AT91C_ADC_CH2         ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  2) // (ADC) Channel 2
01669 #define AT91C_ADC_CH3         ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  3) // (ADC) Channel 3
01670 #define AT91C_ADC_CH4         ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  4) // (ADC) Channel 4
01671 #define AT91C_ADC_CH5         ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  5) // (ADC) Channel 5
01672 #define AT91C_ADC_CH6         ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  6) // (ADC) Channel 6
01673 #define AT91C_ADC_CH7         ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  7) // (ADC) Channel 7
01674 // --------     ADC_CHDR : (ADC Offset: 0x14) ADC Channel Disable Register -------- 
01675 // --------     ADC_CHSR : (ADC Offset: 0x18) ADC Channel Status Register -------- 
01676 // -------- ADC_SR : (ADC Offset: 0x1c) ADC Status Register -------- 
01677 #define AT91C_ADC_EOC0        ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  0) // (ADC) End of Conversion
01678 #define AT91C_ADC_EOC1        ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  1) // (ADC) End of Conversion
01679 #define AT91C_ADC_EOC2        ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  2) // (ADC) End of Conversion
01680 #define AT91C_ADC_EOC3        ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  3) // (ADC) End of Conversion
01681 #define AT91C_ADC_EOC4        ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  4) // (ADC) End of Conversion
01682 #define AT91C_ADC_EOC5        ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  5) // (ADC) End of Conversion
01683 #define AT91C_ADC_EOC6        ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  6) // (ADC) End of Conversion
01684 #define AT91C_ADC_EOC7        ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  7) // (ADC) End of Conversion
01685 #define AT91C_ADC_OVRE0       ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  8) // (ADC) Overrun Error
01686 #define AT91C_ADC_OVRE1       ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  9) // (ADC) Overrun Error
01687 #define AT91C_ADC_OVRE2       ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 10) // (ADC) Overrun Error
01688 #define AT91C_ADC_OVRE3       ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 11) // (ADC) Overrun Error
01689 #define AT91C_ADC_OVRE4       ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 12) // (ADC) Overrun Error
01690 #define AT91C_ADC_OVRE5       ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 13) // (ADC) Overrun Error
01691 #define AT91C_ADC_OVRE6       ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 14) // (ADC) Overrun Error
01692 #define AT91C_ADC_OVRE7       ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 15) // (ADC) Overrun Error
01693 #define AT91C_ADC_DRDY        ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 16) // (ADC) Data Ready
01694 #define AT91C_ADC_GOVRE       ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 17) // (ADC) General Overrun
01695 #define AT91C_ADC_ENDRX       ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 18) // (ADC) End of Receiver Transfer
01696 #define AT91C_ADC_RXBUFF      ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 19) // (ADC) RXBUFF Interrupt
01697 // -------- ADC_LCDR : (ADC Offset: 0x20) ADC Last Converted Data Register -------- 
01698 #define AT91C_ADC_LDATA       ((unsigned int) 0x3FF <<  0) // (ADC) Last Data Converted
01699 // -------- ADC_IER : (ADC Offset: 0x24) ADC Interrupt Enable Register -------- 
01700 // -------- ADC_IDR : (ADC Offset: 0x28) ADC Interrupt Disable Register -------- 
01701 // -------- ADC_IMR : (ADC Offset: 0x2c) ADC Interrupt Mask Register -------- 
01702 // -------- ADC_CDR0 : (ADC Offset: 0x30) ADC Channel Data Register 0 -------- 
01703 #define AT91C_ADC_DATA        ((unsigned int) 0x3FF <<  0) // (ADC) Converted Data
01704 // -------- ADC_CDR1 : (ADC Offset: 0x34) ADC Channel Data Register 1 -------- 
01705 // -------- ADC_CDR2 : (ADC Offset: 0x38) ADC Channel Data Register 2 -------- 
01706 // -------- ADC_CDR3 : (ADC Offset: 0x3c) ADC Channel Data Register 3 -------- 
01707 // -------- ADC_CDR4 : (ADC Offset: 0x40) ADC Channel Data Register 4 -------- 
01708 // -------- ADC_CDR5 : (ADC Offset: 0x44) ADC Channel Data Register 5 -------- 
01709 // -------- ADC_CDR6 : (ADC Offset: 0x48) ADC Channel Data Register 6 --------

01712 // *****************************************************************************
01713 //              SOFTWARE API DEFINITION  FOR Advanced  Encryption Standard
01714 // *****************************************************************************
01715 typedef struct _AT91S_AES {
01716         AT91_REG         AES_CR;        // Control Register
01717         AT91_REG         AES_MR;        // Mode Register
01718         AT91_REG         Reserved0[2];  // 
01719         AT91_REG         AES_IER;       // Interrupt Enable Register
01720         AT91_REG         AES_IDR;       // Interrupt Disable Register
01721         AT91_REG         AES_IMR;       // Interrupt Mask Register
01722         AT91_REG         AES_ISR;       // Interrupt Status Register
01723         AT91_REG         AES_KEYWxR[4];         // Key Word x Register
01724         AT91_REG         Reserved1[4];  // 
01725         AT91_REG         AES_IDATAxR[4];        // Input Data x Register
01726         AT91_REG         AES_ODATAxR[4];        // Output Data x Register
01727         AT91_REG         AES_IVxR[4];   // Initialization Vector x Register
01728         AT91_REG         Reserved2[35];         // 
01729         AT91_REG         AES_VR;        // AES Version Register
01730         AT91_REG         AES_RPR;       // Receive Pointer Register
01731         AT91_REG         AES_RCR;       // Receive Counter Register
01732         AT91_REG         AES_TPR;       // Transmit Pointer Register
01733         AT91_REG         AES_TCR;       // Transmit Counter Register
01734         AT91_REG         AES_RNPR;      // Receive Next Pointer Register
01735         AT91_REG         AES_RNCR;      // Receive Next Counter Register
01736         AT91_REG         AES_TNPR;      // Transmit Next Pointer Register
01737         AT91_REG         AES_TNCR;      // Transmit Next Counter Register
01738         AT91_REG         AES_PTCR;      // PDC Transfer Control Register
01739         AT91_REG         AES_PTSR;      // PDC Transfer Status Register
01740 } AT91S_AES, *AT91PS_AES;
01741 
01742 // -------- AES_CR : (AES Offset: 0x0) Control Register -------- 
01743 #define AT91C_AES_START       ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  0) // (AES) Starts Processing
01744 #define AT91C_AES_SWRST       ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  8) // (AES) Software Reset
01745 #define AT91C_AES_LOADSEED    ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 16) // (AES) Random Number Generator Seed Loading
01746 // -------- AES_MR : (AES Offset: 0x4) Mode Register -------- 
01747 #define AT91C_AES_CIPHER      ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  0) // (AES) Processing Mode
01748 #define AT91C_AES_PROCDLY     ((unsigned int) 0xF <<  4) // (AES) Processing Delay
01749 #define AT91C_AES_SMOD        ((unsigned int) 0x3 <<  8) // (AES) Start Mode
01750 #define         AT91C_AES_SMOD_MANUAL               ((unsigned int) 0x0 <<  8) // (AES) Manual Mode: The START bit in register AES_CR must be set to begin encryption or decryption.
01751 #define         AT91C_AES_SMOD_AUTO                 ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  8) // (AES) Auto Mode: no action in AES_CR is necessary (cf datasheet).
01752 #define         AT91C_AES_SMOD_PDC                  ((unsigned int) 0x2 <<  8) // (AES) PDC Mode (cf datasheet).
01753 #define AT91C_AES_OPMOD       ((unsigned int) 0x7 << 12) // (AES) Operation Mode
01754 #define         AT91C_AES_OPMOD_ECB                  ((unsigned int) 0x0 << 12) // (AES) ECB Electronic CodeBook mode.
01755 #define         AT91C_AES_OPMOD_CBC                  ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 12) // (AES) CBC Cipher Block Chaining mode.
01756 #define         AT91C_AES_OPMOD_OFB                  ((unsigned int) 0x2 << 12) // (AES) OFB Output Feedback mode.
01757 #define         AT91C_AES_OPMOD_CFB                  ((unsigned int) 0x3 << 12) // (AES) CFB Cipher Feedback mode.
01758 #define         AT91C_AES_OPMOD_CTR                  ((unsigned int) 0x4 << 12) // (AES) CTR Counter mode.
01759 #define AT91C_AES_LOD         ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 15) // (AES) Last Output Data Mode
01760 #define AT91C_AES_CFBS        ((unsigned int) 0x7 << 16) // (AES) Cipher Feedback Data Size
01761 #define         AT91C_AES_CFBS_128_BIT              ((unsigned int) 0x0 << 16) // (AES) 128-bit.
01762 #define         AT91C_AES_CFBS_64_BIT               ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 16) // (AES) 64-bit.
01763 #define         AT91C_AES_CFBS_32_BIT               ((unsigned int) 0x2 << 16) // (AES) 32-bit.
01764 #define         AT91C_AES_CFBS_16_BIT               ((unsigned int) 0x3 << 16) // (AES) 16-bit.
01765 #define         AT91C_AES_CFBS_8_BIT                ((unsigned int) 0x4 << 16) // (AES) 8-bit.
01766 #define AT91C_AES_CKEY        ((unsigned int) 0xF << 20) // (AES) Countermeasure Key
01767 #define AT91C_AES_CTYPE       ((unsigned int) 0x1F << 24) // (AES) Countermeasure Type
01768 #define         AT91C_AES_CTYPE_TYPE1_EN             ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 24) // (AES) Countermeasure type 1 is enabled.
01769 #define         AT91C_AES_CTYPE_TYPE2_EN             ((unsigned int) 0x2 << 24) // (AES) Countermeasure type 2 is enabled.
01770 #define         AT91C_AES_CTYPE_TYPE3_EN             ((unsigned int) 0x4 << 24) // (AES) Countermeasure type 3 is enabled.
01771 #define         AT91C_AES_CTYPE_TYPE4_EN             ((unsigned int) 0x8 << 24) // (AES) Countermeasure type 4 is enabled.
01772 #define         AT91C_AES_CTYPE_TYPE5_EN             ((unsigned int) 0x10 << 24) // (AES) Countermeasure type 5 is enabled.
01773 // -------- AES_IER : (AES Offset: 0x10) Interrupt Enable Register -------- 
01774 #define AT91C_AES_DATRDY      ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  0) // (AES) DATRDY
01775 #define AT91C_AES_ENDRX       ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  1) // (AES) PDC Read Buffer End
01776 #define AT91C_AES_ENDTX       ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  2) // (AES) PDC Write Buffer End
01777 #define AT91C_AES_RXBUFF      ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  3) // (AES) PDC Read Buffer Full
01778 #define AT91C_AES_TXBUFE      ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  4) // (AES) PDC Write Buffer Empty
01779 #define AT91C_AES_URAD        ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  8) // (AES) Unspecified Register Access Detection
01780 // -------- AES_IDR : (AES Offset: 0x14) Interrupt Disable Register -------- 
01781 // -------- AES_IMR : (AES Offset: 0x18) Interrupt Mask Register -------- 
01782 // -------- AES_ISR : (AES Offset: 0x1c) Interrupt Status Register -------- 
01783 #define AT91C_AES_URAT        ((unsigned int) 0x7 << 12) // (AES) Unspecified Register Access Type Status
01784 #define         AT91C_AES_URAT_IN_DAT_WRITE_DATPROC ((unsigned int) 0x0 << 12) // (AES) Input data register written during the data processing in PDC mode.
01785 #define         AT91C_AES_URAT_OUT_DAT_READ_DATPROC ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 12) // (AES) Output data register read during the data processing.
01786 #define         AT91C_AES_URAT_MODEREG_WRITE_DATPROC ((unsigned int) 0x2 << 12) // (AES) Mode register written during the data processing.
01787 #define         AT91C_AES_URAT_OUT_DAT_READ_SUBKEY  ((unsigned int) 0x3 << 12) // (AES) Output data register read during the sub-keys generation.
01788 #define         AT91C_AES_URAT_MODEREG_WRITE_SUBKEY ((unsigned int) 0x4 << 12) // (AES) Mode register written during the sub-keys generation.
01789 #define         AT91C_AES_URAT_WO_REG_READ          ((unsigned int) 0x5 << 12) // (AES) Write-only register read access.
01790 
01791 // *****************************************************************************
01792 //              SOFTWARE API DEFINITION  FOR Triple Data Encryption Standard
01793 // *****************************************************************************
01794 typedef struct _AT91S_TDES {
01795         AT91_REG         TDES_CR;       // Control Register
01796         AT91_REG         TDES_MR;       // Mode Register
01797         AT91_REG         Reserved0[2];  // 
01798         AT91_REG         TDES_IER;      // Interrupt Enable Register
01799         AT91_REG         TDES_IDR;      // Interrupt Disable Register
01800         AT91_REG         TDES_IMR;      // Interrupt Mask Register
01801         AT91_REG         TDES_ISR;      // Interrupt Status Register
01802         AT91_REG         TDES_KEY1WxR[2];       // Key 1 Word x Register
01803         AT91_REG         TDES_KEY2WxR[2];       // Key 2 Word x Register
01804         AT91_REG         TDES_KEY3WxR[2];       // Key 3 Word x Register
01805         AT91_REG         Reserved1[2];  // 
01806         AT91_REG         TDES_IDATAxR[2];       // Input Data x Register
01807         AT91_REG         Reserved2[2];  // 
01808         AT91_REG         TDES_ODATAxR[2];       // Output Data x Register
01809         AT91_REG         Reserved3[2];  // 
01810         AT91_REG         TDES_IVxR[2];  // Initialization Vector x Register
01811         AT91_REG         Reserved4[37];         // 
01812         AT91_REG         TDES_VR;       // TDES Version Register
01813         AT91_REG         TDES_RPR;      // Receive Pointer Register
01814         AT91_REG         TDES_RCR;      // Receive Counter Register
01815         AT91_REG         TDES_TPR;      // Transmit Pointer Register
01816         AT91_REG         TDES_TCR;      // Transmit Counter Register
01817         AT91_REG         TDES_RNPR;     // Receive Next Pointer Register
01818         AT91_REG         TDES_RNCR;     // Receive Next Counter Register
01819         AT91_REG         TDES_TNPR;     // Transmit Next Pointer Register
01820         AT91_REG         TDES_TNCR;     // Transmit Next Counter Register
01821         AT91_REG         TDES_PTCR;     // PDC Transfer Control Register
01822         AT91_REG         TDES_PTSR;     // PDC Transfer Status Register
01823 } AT91S_TDES, *AT91PS_TDES;
01824 
01825 // -------- TDES_CR : (TDES Offset: 0x0) Control Register -------- 
01826 #define AT91C_TDES_START      ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  0) // (TDES) Starts Processing
01827 #define AT91C_TDES_SWRST      ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  8) // (TDES) Software Reset
01828 // -------- TDES_MR : (TDES Offset: 0x4) Mode Register -------- 
01829 #define AT91C_TDES_CIPHER     ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  0) // (TDES) Processing Mode
01830 #define AT91C_TDES_TDESMOD    ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  1) // (TDES) Single or Triple DES Mode
01831 #define AT91C_TDES_KEYMOD     ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  4) // (TDES) Key Mode
01832 #define AT91C_TDES_SMOD       ((unsigned int) 0x3 <<  8) // (TDES) Start Mode
01833 #define         AT91C_TDES_SMOD_MANUAL               ((unsigned int) 0x0 <<  8) // (TDES) Manual Mode: The START bit in register TDES_CR must be set to begin encryption or decryption.
01834 #define         AT91C_TDES_SMOD_AUTO                 ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  8) // (TDES) Auto Mode: no action in TDES_CR is necessary (cf datasheet).
01835 #define         AT91C_TDES_SMOD_PDC                  ((unsigned int) 0x2 <<  8) // (TDES) PDC Mode (cf datasheet).
01836 #define AT91C_TDES_OPMOD      ((unsigned int) 0x3 << 12) // (TDES) Operation Mode
01837 #define         AT91C_TDES_OPMOD_ECB                  ((unsigned int) 0x0 << 12) // (TDES) ECB Electronic CodeBook mode.
01838 #define         AT91C_TDES_OPMOD_CBC                  ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 12) // (TDES) CBC Cipher Block Chaining mode.
01839 #define         AT91C_TDES_OPMOD_OFB                  ((unsigned int) 0x2 << 12) // (TDES) OFB Output Feedback mode.
01840 #define         AT91C_TDES_OPMOD_CFB                  ((unsigned int) 0x3 << 12) // (TDES) CFB Cipher Feedback mode.
01841 #define AT91C_TDES_LOD        ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 15) // (TDES) Last Output Data Mode
01842 #define AT91C_TDES_CFBS       ((unsigned int) 0x3 << 16) // (TDES) Cipher Feedback Data Size
01843 #define         AT91C_TDES_CFBS_64_BIT               ((unsigned int) 0x0 << 16) // (TDES) 64-bit.
01844 #define         AT91C_TDES_CFBS_32_BIT               ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 16) // (TDES) 32-bit.
01845 #define         AT91C_TDES_CFBS_16_BIT               ((unsigned int) 0x2 << 16) // (TDES) 16-bit.
01846 #define         AT91C_TDES_CFBS_8_BIT                ((unsigned int) 0x3 << 16) // (TDES) 8-bit.
01847 // -------- TDES_IER : (TDES Offset: 0x10) Interrupt Enable Register -------- 
01848 #define AT91C_TDES_DATRDY     ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  0) // (TDES) DATRDY
01849 #define AT91C_TDES_ENDRX      ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  1) // (TDES) PDC Read Buffer End
01850 #define AT91C_TDES_ENDTX      ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  2) // (TDES) PDC Write Buffer End
01851 #define AT91C_TDES_RXBUFF     ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  3) // (TDES) PDC Read Buffer Full
01852 #define AT91C_TDES_TXBUFE     ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  4) // (TDES) PDC Write Buffer Empty
01853 #define AT91C_TDES_URAD       ((unsigned int) 0x1 <<  8) // (TDES) Unspecified Register Access Detection
01854 // -------- TDES_IDR : (TDES Offset: 0x14) Interrupt Disable Register -------- 
01855 // -------- TDES_IMR : (TDES Offset: 0x18) Interrupt Mask Register -------- 
01856 // -------- TDES_ISR : (TDES Offset: 0x1c) Interrupt Status Register -------- 
01857 #define AT91C_TDES_URAT       ((unsigned int) 0x3 << 12) // (TDES) Unspecified Register Access Type Status
01858 #define         AT91C_TDES_URAT_IN_DAT_WRITE_DATPROC ((unsigned int) 0x0 << 12) // (TDES) Input data register written during the data processing in PDC mode.
01859 #define         AT91C_TDES_URAT_OUT_DAT_READ_DATPROC ((unsigned int) 0x1 << 12) // (TDES) Output data register read during the data processing.
01860 #define         AT91C_TDES_URAT_MODEREG_WRITE_DATPROC ((unsigned int) 0x2 << 12) // (TDES) Mode register written during the data processing.
01861 #define         AT91C_TDES_URAT_WO_REG_READ          ((unsigned int) 0x3 << 12) // (TDES) Write-only register read access.
01862

02414 #define AT91C_AES_VR    ((AT91_REG *)   0xFFFA40FC) // (AES) AES Version Register
02415 #define AT91C_AES_ODATAxR ((AT91_REG *)         0xFFFA4050) // (AES) Output Data x Register
02416 #define AT91C_AES_IDATAxR ((AT91_REG *)         0xFFFA4040) // (AES) Input Data x Register
02417 #define AT91C_AES_CR    ((AT91_REG *)   0xFFFA4000) // (AES) Control Register
02418 #define AT91C_AES_IDR   ((AT91_REG *)   0xFFFA4014) // (AES) Interrupt Disable Register
02419 #define AT91C_AES_IMR   ((AT91_REG *)   0xFFFA4018) // (AES) Interrupt Mask Register
02420 #define AT91C_AES_IER   ((AT91_REG *)   0xFFFA4010) // (AES) Interrupt Enable Register
02421 #define AT91C_AES_KEYWxR ((AT91_REG *)  0xFFFA4020) // (AES) Key Word x Register
02422 #define AT91C_AES_ISR   ((AT91_REG *)   0xFFFA401C) // (AES) Interrupt Status Register

02428 #define AT91C_TDES_RNPR ((AT91_REG *)   0xFFFA8110) // (PDC_TDES) Receive Next Pointer Register

02630 #define AT91C_ID_UDP    ((unsigned int) 11) // USB Device Port
02631 #define AT91C_ID_TC0    ((unsigned int) 12) // Timer Counter 0
02632 #define AT91C_ID_TC1    ((unsigned int) 13) // Timer Counter 1
02633 #define AT91C_ID_TC2    ((unsigned int) 14) // Timer Counter 2
02634 #define AT91C_ID_CAN    ((unsigned int) 15) // Control Area Network Controller

02636 #define AT91C_ID_ADC    ((unsigned int) 17) // Analog-to-Digital Converter
02637 #define AT91C_ID_AES    ((unsigned int) 18) // Advanced Encryption Standard 128-bit
02638 #define AT91C_ID_TDES   ((unsigned int) 19) // Triple Data Encryption Standard
02639 #define AT91C_ID_20_Reserved ((unsigned int) 20) // Reserved
02640 #define AT91C_ID_21_Reserved ((unsigned int) 21) // Reserved

02643 #define AT91C_ID_24_Reserved ((unsigned int) 24) // Reserved

02645 #define AT91C_ID_26_Reserved ((unsigned int) 26) // Reserved

02715 #define AT91F_AIC_ConfigureIt( irq_id, priority, src_type, newHandler )         \
02716 {                                                                                                                                                       \
02717     unsigned int mask ;                                                                                                         \
02718                                                                                                                                                         \
02719     mask = 0x1 << irq_id;                                                                                                       \
02720     /* Disable the interrupt on the interrupt controller */                                     \
02721     AT91C_BASE_AIC->AIC_IDCR = mask ;                                                                           \
02722     /* Save the interrupt handler routine pointer and the interrupt priority */ \
02723     AT91C_BASE_AIC->AIC_SVR[irq_id] = (unsigned int) newHandler ;                       \
02724     /* Store the Source Mode Register */                                                                        \
02725     AT91C_BASE_AIC->AIC_SMR[irq_id] = src_type | priority  ;                            \
02726     /* Clear the interrupt on the interrupt controller */                                       \
02727     AT91C_BASE_AIC->AIC_ICCR = mask ;                                                                           \
02728 }

02730 
02731 #endif
